choices: Flew in another dorm window to rest in Becca's top
Flew across campus to rest in Pam's book bag
Flew across town to Mark's home, onto Wendy's desk
Flew into one of Greta's sticky doughnuts
Flew down to the woods and bounced in front of Sybil
1.content:
Mark Harding was a regular college student at LSUB (Local State University Branch). He loved being away in college with no responsibilities, his own room, a girlfriend and an easy major, although next year, when his annoying, judgmental, over-achieving sister Wendy arrived, would be less fun. She would no doubt keep a close eye on him and report back to his parents on anything he did that she didn't approve of, which was usually everything. But until then he had little to worry about. His girlfriend, Pam Brent, was one of the cuter girls on campus, with a good figure and nice personality, although she could be the jealous type, having been hurt by some prior boyfriends. Mark also had a well-paying sales job during summers, which would probably turn into a permanent job when he graduated in a year. Still, he was not content. There were many better athletes than he on campus who had varsity jackets and opportunities for professional contracts, hotter girls than Pam, better jobs than the one he would have, and he didn't see a path to getting them.

One day Mark was out for a run. Sybil Manning, one of the college's track stars had just passed him on the trail, her blond pony tail and her pert ass waving back and forth, mocking him with her superior speed. He was about to speed up and pass her back when something bright caught his eye. It was a ring, resting in a knot of an old tree. He stopped to pry it out. Although it was dirty and slightly bent, something made him slide the ring over his finger. Once it rested beneath his knuckle, he felt unusual sense of well-being fill him, as though his body and mind had suddenly gained an extra dimension of perception and ability. 'What is it?' he asked himself. Instantly, the answer came to him. 'The ring I've put on has infinite power. With this ring on my finger I can do anything, absolutely anything.' 'But how?' he asked. 'Think, and it will be,' the answer came.

Cautiously Mark looked at the tree and decided to make it a STOP sign. Before he could blink, there was a stop sign in the middle of the woods. He stepped backwards, his heart beating hard, and looked down at the ring, which was unchanged. It showed no sign of having, or using, any kind of magical power. He looked at the sign again. 'Make it look like Pam,' he thought, and now it was a statue of Pam holding a STOP sign. 'Make her skin, hair and eyes exactly her color, and have her wear her purple bikini,' he thought. He walked around, inspecting her. This was amazing. A thought occurred to him. What would she look like with larger breasts? With another thought he was inspecting his busty 'model'. Longer legs? A slightly smaller nose? Blond hair? He grinned. Not bad. But it wasn't Pam. He turned the statue and STOP sign back into a tree and started running again, thinking.

'What was the point of exercise, when I can just will myself into better condition?' A moment later he was in peak physical condition. To test it he ran faster, breaking into a sprint. He ran harder until he caught up to Sybil, ran beside her as she progressively increased her pace, and then left her in the dust, then turned around and went by her again, continuing for five minutes more before his breathing became a little ragged and he slowed down. He could do better. He thought about running as fast as Usain Bolt for twenty miles and sped up again, sprinting across campus, turning heads everywhere. He slowed down at his dorm, not even breathing hard, looked down at the ring and smiled. 'Yes!'

He climbed the stairs three at a time. He reached the hall lounge. Becca Starnes was there, talking to her boyfriend, John Mars, and two other jocks, Clem Varney and Chad Holtz. They looked at him briefly and went back to their conversation. Mark stared at Becca. She was by far the hottest girl on campus. She was nearly as tall as he was, with large breasts, a tiny waist and long, long legs. John was going on about some play he had run last Saturday, a long pass that resulted in a touchdown. She looked bored, put her hand on her hip and moved it back and forth. Conversation stopped and the three jocks, along with Mark, were transfixed by the way her body moved.

"So, are you taking me to New York tomorrow, or what? I have to go to Saks for that dress. They won't deliver it on time for the formal," she said haughtily.

"We have practice, babes," John said, his eyes still focused on her body.

"You ALWAYS have practice," she replied, tossing her head. "Am I supposed to go to the city alone?"

"Hey, what are YOU looking at?" John said, glaring at Mark.

Mark left, embarrassed. He passed Greta, his fat next door neighbor, barely acknowledging her. Pam was waiting for him in his room, writing her English paper. "Hey, you finished early. Changed your mind about the workout? Are you feeling ok?"

"Um, no. I'm fine," he replied, mentally comparing her with Becca. "I, er, just ran faster."

"Oh? You're hardly even perspiring!" she said, raising an eyebrow, wondering what he really had been up to. "Where'd you get that ring?" she asked, taking his hand. "It's not your usual style, you know. You hate jewellery."

He pulled his hand away. "It's nothing. I, um, found it and just put it on. I kind of like it."

"Oh," she said, not approving, but not wanting to argue about it, yet. Something was funny. She went back to the desk. "You going to take a shower before we go to class?"

He nodded. What he really wanted was to be alone to experiment with the ring, but it was one thing to experiment on himself or trees. He wasn't ready to do anything to other people. He grabbed some clothes and went to the door, then went back to Pam and gave her a quick kiss before leaving. She didn't seem very pleased with him.

In the shower he thought about what he wanted to do. It would be something to be a better athlete than any of those assholes talking to Becca, to have Becca as his girlfriend instead of Pam. Was there any limit on what he could do? 'No' the thought came to him. 'No limits to the wearer of the ring.'

He looked down at his body. It wasn't bad, but it could be better. He made his muscles larger, stronger. He increased his height by two inches, then five inches. He made his tool 30% larger and 25% thicker. But Pam would notice and ask questions. He could make her not notice, but he didn't want to mess with her mind. Not yet. He returned his body to its original state. He could still be stronger, faster, fitter, without changing his body. Hell, he could have Superman's powers. He could be ten times as powerful as Superman. Why not? One thought and it was done.

'Heh, heh. Let those jocks try something with him now!'

He stopped the shower. He looked through the walls and saw Becca still talking to those assholes. He looked at her more closely, calibrating his vision to look through her clothing. She was perfect! He looked down at his erection, which now was hard enough to penetrate steel. 'Yes!'

He stopped the shower and headed back to his room. "You know, Pam, you're right. I don't feel that great, really," he lied. "Can you take notes for me?"

She smiled but inside she was frowning. 'Something was up', she thought. 'He thinks he can lie to me, but I know the signs.' But she said, "I thought so. Sure. Are you going to hang out here? Do you want me to bring you back anything to eat?"

"Um, no. I think I'll just lie down."

"OK." 'Something was up. She didn't know why, but she could feel that his feelings had changed. Men could be such jerks. She'd be on her guard; she wasn't going to be the one who got dumped.' She pursed her lips, gathered up her books and gave him a hug. "I'll check in on you later."

She left and he watched her go down the hall and out of the building. Nice ass, nice person. But he was Superman now. Ha! He could whip Superman now with one hand tied behind his back. He could do far better than Pam!

The first thing he wanted to do was try out the rest of his powers. He looked around his room. He grasped the metal bar of his bed and squeezed it flat with two fingers and sharpened it into a point. He pressed it against his palm and it flattened against impenetrable skin. He looked at a piece of paper on his desk and it burst into flames. 'Yes! Now flying and super-speed.' But he didn't want to burn his clothing too. He made them as resistant to heat and friction as he was. 'But what about the ring? What if it melted?' He willed it to be heat resistant too. 'Something felt wrong, but what?' he wondered. 'The properties of the ring are unchangeable by the power of the ring,' the thought came back. He was stumped for a moment, then carefully removed the ring. He immediately felt the loss of the ring's powers. He slipped it in the pocket of his sports jacket. 'No one would look for it there, and he would be fine with superpowers, for now.' He opened the window and, so that no one would see him, flew out at super-speed. In moments he was miles above the campus, beholding the splendors of the city and of flight. There was Superman, coming at him to investigate. In a flash he had him in a headlock. The mighty Superman couldn't break his grip. He was at his mercy! There was nothing he couldn't do!

Back on campus, his exit created a massive wind that blew out the window, and the vortex of air emptied the room's contents. The ring tumbled out of the safety of his jacket pocket, whirled into the vortex, spun wildly in every direction until it ....
1.title: It begins with Mark

choices: Men are so attracted to pretty girls that they must obey them
Girls can take away a man’s strength if he misbehaves
Becca drops the ring, and another girl picks it up
11.content:
Becca was still hard at work. She had swiveled her hips and John had agreed to take her to Saks Fifth Avenue. A few shakes of her shoulders and he was taking her out to a show as well. A heavy sigh and Clem Varney would find someone to do her math paper. She still needed to find a prom date for her skinny, plain sister to get her parents off her back. She didn't know the other boy at all, but he sure was big and muscular. Maybe Ellen would like that. Anyway, he was as good as she'd get. Ellen! How pathetic it must be to be so plain that you had take any boy who came your way!

John was droning on again about football. She liked to watch him play, especially when he dominated the other boys and didn't get tackled -- that must really hurt! Ugh! But it was so boring to hear him talk about it! And he went on and on and on about this play and this pass and that tackle. Boring!

She was just going to interrupt again to talk about something more interesting when there was a loud crack down the hall like the whole building was breaking, then a frightening gust of wind. Dust got in her eyes and her hair was blown around. Her blow dry was ruined! She turned away to shield her face and her makeup, but as she did she felt a sharp sting in her neck. A bee sting? She looked down, worried there would be a huge welt, but instead she saw a ring caught in the folds of her blouse where it pulled above her bust. The ring wasn't pretty at all -- some cheap trinket. She picked it up to throw it away but as she held it, it briefly rested around her pinkie, and she stopped short.

It was as if the world around her became brighter and clearer, it sounds became sharper and more melodious. The boys sexier but also ... easier. She let the ring drop into her palm and everything went back to normal. Ewww! She slipped it back onto her ring finger and pushed it on tightly and securely. Ahhhh!

"What the HELL was that?!" John was saying, looking around at the debris. "It sounded like a bomb! Fucking terrorists I bet! Well, it doesn't look like there's any real damage," he added, looking around.

"Yeah. It figures they'd just throw a bomb or something and run away. I'd like to see what they could do man-to-man, you know?" he said, puffing out his chest.

'Terrorists? A bomb? Was there a bomb here?!!' Becca wondered, and before she voiced her concern the thought came back, 'There was no bomb. No terrorists.' Becca paused. 'How did I know that?' The thought came back. 'Anything you want to know, you'll know.'

"There was no bomb," she blurted casually. "No terrorists either."

John and Clem turned to her in surprise. "How do YOU know that?" John said aggressively, looking down at her.

'How do I know?' she wondered, hoping that voice would answer. 'Because you wanted to.' 'Just because I want something …' '… you can have it.' the voice replied. 'Anything?' 'Anything.' 'Ha! Well, I want John and Clem to stop asking questions I can’t answer. They should just believe me.'

John suddenly said, "OK. Sure, you're right, Becca." He nodded vigorously.

'Yeah, there's no bomb," Clem agreed.

Becca beamed. ‘This is fun. I want to get what I want all the time!’

Chad Holtz was looking at them curiously. "Um, was there some kind of secret message I didn't get?" he asked John.

"Hey!" he said, putting his finger in Chad's chest. "Becca said it, and I believe her. That’s it. What do YOU think you know about it, huh?"

Becca smiled and rewarded John with a hand on his shoulder and a quick kiss. "That's so sweet of you," she said approvingly. "I like it when you respect my opinions and stick up for me."

John nodded again. "You should just lay off her!" He warned Chad, who looked puzzled at first but then was getting angry.

"Fuck it, John. I know she's your girl, and she is hot, but don’t start using your dick for a brain. She's a total airhead.” His large muscles tensed.

Becca was shocked. She was NOT an airhead. She had lots of ideas, important ideas. Boys were always paying attention to her when she talked, although not so much before as just now. Still, she had no idea Chad could be so mean! He was scary when he was angry, especially when his big muscles started twitching. He looked so much stronger than John.

“Hey! You’re out of line, Chad!” John said firmly, stepping up to him.

Chad looked down at John and pushed him, sending him spinning across the room. “Don’t be a dickhead. She’s just a girl! If you don’t know that, you’re as dumb as she is.”

“I’m not dumb!” Becca declared. “Just because I’m not a great student doesn’t mean I’m dumb. Right John?”

“That’s right!” He got up and went right back to Chad. This time, Chad punched him, knocking him down in one punch.

Becca ran to him and held him. “Oh John! John! Are you all right?” She wanted to help, but what could SHE do against Chad. He was so strong, and she was just a girl! What she wanted was for John to be strong enough to beat Chad.

Immediately after she thought this, John’s body felt different to her. Harder. Heavier. He shook his head and stood up. “Damn it, Chad!” He walked quickly up to him.

“Don’t be an idiot, John. I don’t want to hurt you so bad you won’t be able to play,” Chad said. “But I will knock some sense into you if you don’t start making sense yourself.”

“Fuck you!” John said, balling his fists, feeling his muscles tense and bulge under his loose shirt.

Chad was surprised. John wasn’t usually so stubborn. But he couldn’t let the cocky quarterback get THIS one over him. He reached back to hit him again, to put him out for awhile this time. He hurled his fist forward, but John caught it in his wrist and then twisted the larger Chad’s arm behind his back.

“HA!” he said, forcing Chad’s arm higher, making the larger boy groan with pain.

Becca watched in fascination. Again, she had just wanted something, and it happened! ‘Was this just her lucky day, or was it something else?’ ‘Something else. You can have whatever you want, so long as you wear the ring.’ She looked down at the ugly ring on her finger. ‘It can be prettier, at least, can’t it?’ ‘No. You can’t change the ring.’ She loved the ring, if it let her have whatever she wanted, but why did it have to be so ugly?’ Becca frowned.

“Hey, babe, what’s the matter? Look at me!” John was saying. He was holding Chad helpless, begging for mercy, with just one arm while Chad and Clem looked at him in disbelief.

“You’re hurting him, John. Stop it,” Becca said, feeling half-responsible for what John was doing.

“Are you kidding? He was beating on me, and he insulted you. He deserves it!” He twisted Chad’s arm harder and pinned him to the wall.

Becca winced. Now John was scaring her. Now he was too strong. She never would cause anyone physical pain. Boys never knew how to behave! Why couldn’t they be nicer, like girls? She looked down at her body, her large, shapely breasts, which were so soft and curvy. Boys loved to look at them, and they felt so good when they touched her. They loved her small waist, her round hips and bottom, and the way everything moved when she walked. She made herself as pretty as she could, which made everybody happy. Everything she did made her and other people want her. She loved boys to bits, but there was something bad about them too. If girls were in charge, the world would definitely be nicer! She looked down at the ring and thought. What if boys were so attracted to pretty girls that they HAD to listen to them? Or if girls could punish boys by taking their strength away if they didn’t use it right, just the way a mother would take away a misused toy. She smiled, thinking about how she would use the ring and make the world a better place. Her getting this ring was going to be such a GOOD thing for everyone!

If only it weren’t so ugly. Even if the ring wouldn’t let her change it, maybe there was something else she could do to make it prettier. She moved away from the grappling boys, just for a moment, to take off the ring and look at it more closely in the light.

Several miles in the air, Mark was getting bored of his battle with Superman. He was so far superior to him that he was beginning to think of the Man of Steel as a mere Man of Jello. Just for fun, knowing it wouldn’t harm him, he ended their battle by hurling Superman 93 million miles into the sun. Now that he had tested his powers, it was time to return to his room and see what more he could do with the ring. Suddenly, he felt a strange feeling run through him, changing him. But that was impossible. He was invincible, ten times as invincible as Superman. He flew back to investigate.
11.title: Flew in dorm window to rest in Becca's top

choices: Pam makes Mark tell her the whole story
Mark resists and Pam takes away his other powers
Becca's next date with John
112.content:
Becca looked down at the ring and thought, “I like guys with muscles.  Being held by someone who is strong, but still gentle makes me feel so safe, but sometimes guys can get kind of out of control and a bit scary.  I think the world would have been a better place if a girl was being able to take a boy’s strength away if she felt he wasn't using it in a good way, like a mother takes away her child’s toy if he misuses it.  We girls would feel a lot safer, and maybe the boys wouldn't always be getting in so much trouble!  What do you think?”

“If you think it is best, then it will be done,” the ring said.

“Oh, you agree!  Good!” she thought.  “Then do it!”

Becca suddenly felt slightly different, as though she had a kind of perception she didn't have before, but she didn't know exactly what it was.  She looked around the common room.  She could see an aura around each of the boys.  They all were different sizes.  John’s was the largest by far, followed by Chad and then Clem, while some of the nerdy boys in the corner had almost nothing at all, just like the girls.  She felt like she could touch it.  It must be their strength!  Yes, of course!  She could reach out and take as much of it as she wanted.  Ooooh!  This was exciting!  She put her hand on John’s arm.  “John, you're hurting him now.  Don't you think Chad's learned his lesson?”

John turned around.  “Becca, let me handle this, please! You're a girl.  You don't know what guys are like, ok?”  Still, John didn't protest long.  Seeing Becca’s disapproving look, he let him go.  

“John sure knows who’s boss,” Chad teased, still smarting from John’s hold.

“Chad!” Becca said sharply.  “That’s not nice at all!”  

Chad looked at Becca anxiously and then down at the ground.  “Sorry, Becca.  I’ll behave better,” he said quickly, hoping he was quick enough.

“All right, Chad,” she said, satisfied.  She was very pleased with herself.  Just the threat of using the power that she and other women had kept the boys from fighting.  The world was going to be a much better place.

“So,” she said, changing the topic, “are you looking forward to your game against Northern State Saturday?”

John looked at her quizzically.  “What game?”

“The football game, you dummy!” she said, giving him  playful tap on the shoulder.

John looked puzzled.  “I don't really care about girls’ football.”

“I mean YOUR football game!” Becca insisted, getting annoyed.  

John looked at Chad and shrugged.  “Honestly, Becca, we don't know what you mean.  Boys don't play competitive sports.  You know that.  I mean, what’s the point?  There’s always some girl around who wants to have a little fun and take away a guy’s strength in the middle of a play.”  Clem and Chad nodded.  

“And with girls from the opposing school in the stands, you could never have a fair game,” Clem added.  “It’s ok.  I mean, we like to play, but there's no sense taking it seriously.  Guys only play for fun and to stay in shape.  It’s funny, but that's just the way it is.  I mean, we are naturally stronger than girls, but we can never depend on having our strength when we need it.  It sure is a funny world.”

“Yeah, life’s strange,” Chad agreed.  He flexed his muscle.  “Look at this bicep, compared to yours, Becca.  I bet I could bench four times as much as you, at least, yet in a blink of an eye you could be twice as strong as I am and beat me to a pulp, and there’d be nothing I could do about it.”

“I wouldn't do that!” Becca declared.  

The boys looked at each other and laughed.  “Of course you wouldn't, Becca,” John said, “but she does it all the time,” he added, pointing at Greta, who was sitting in the corner.  Greta waved smugly, flexed her fat, but not unmuscular arm, and went back to her book.  

Becca wasn't too sure this was what she had in mind, but it did seem quiet and peaceful around the dorm, and it was nice not hearing the guys go on and on about last week’s game and next week’s game. Girls were just fairer than boys and wouldn't take advantage of them.  She still thought she had the right idea.  Maybe she just had to get used to it.

A few doors away Mark was frantically searching his room for the ring.  How could he have been so stupid to take it off?  It was no longer in the pocket of his sports jacket, and it hadn't fallen on the floor.  It must have been blown out of the room when he flew out in such a hurry, but everything else he owned was in a pile below his window.  Someone else must have taken it, they would have its powers now and could take away his superpowers at any moment, as easily as some random girl could take away his strength.  

He couldn't remember now why he hadn't changed the world to eliminate that horrible female power when he had the ring.  It should have been the first thing he did!  He could have made the whole world better, both for himself and other men.  He tried to imagine what it would be like not to be at the mercy of the whims of every passing female, whether two years old or 102, to have to do what she thought was right or become as weak as a kitten, but it was beyond his power to conceive of.

He remembered his crushing dismay when his sister Wendy first started using her power on him.  He was six years old then, she was nearly five, and she had just come back from a birthday party.  She had shown him a basketball she had received as a party favor, and he had taken it away, saying she was too little to play basketball.  She looked like she was going to start crying and call their mother, when she started staring at him.  

“You're being mean!  I may be little, but I’m gonna make you too weak to take my ball away!” she said.  

“What?” he said.  “You can't do that!” he replied confidently.

“Yes I can!  Amanda showed me how at the party, and she learned it from her big sister, who's eight and is older than you!”

He was holding the ball up in the air, too high for her to reach, when it started getting heavier and heavier.  He lowered it to his chest, hugging it with both arms, but they  were getting more and more tired.  His knees were going wobbly too.

“See?  See?  I told you I could do it!” she said.  She pulled the ball out of his arms and held it over her head triumphantly.  He tried to take it back it back, but could barely grip the ball, much less wrest it from her hands.  Even standing up was becoming too difficult.

“See?  I took away your strong by pulling your ohla away.  (She meant his aura, he later learned, something boys couldn't see but girls could.)  And I won't give it back unless you promise not to take my ball away, ever again.”

He tried several times again and then agreed.  Suddenly he felt his strength return, so he grabbed the ball and started running away with it.  He only got a few steps away before his legs became too heavy to lift off the ground and the ball rolled out of his arms.  

“You're bad!” she said, standing over him with the ball.  “Boys are bad, and that's why girls take their strong away until the boy decides to be good.”  She put the ball down and sat on top of him.  He tried to push her off, and she laughed.  “No, no, silly!  You can't.  You're only two year strong now, and I'm almost five so I'm much stronger than two year olds!”

Just then their mother came in.  She immediately saw what had happened and pulled Wendy off him.  She sighed and said, “Oh, I'd hoped this wouldn't happen for another few years, but children do talk!  Wendy go to your room.  Now!  But first, give your brother his strength back.”  

“But Mommy, he was being bad!  He took my ball away.  I'm supposed to take his strong away when he’s wrong!  Amanda said.”  

Mark’s mother looked at him and sighed.  “Well, Mark won't do that again. Right Mark?”  Mark nodded and his strength returned again.  He wanted to hit Wendy but didn't dare, not with their mother right there.

Mark never beat Wendy at anything physical again.  By  the time he was eight he just stopped trying, while Wendy played competitive sports throughout school.  Life is so unfair, he thought, and now he had blown the one chance in the universe to make it fairer!

Just then, the door opened.  It was Pam, back from her class.  She stared at the hole in the wall.  “What happened here?  It looks like a tornado!”

Mark shook his head.  “Um nothing,” he said.  Not telling the truth to a girl was always dangerous.  She would just take his strength away until she was satisfied she had the full story.  The less he said the better, until her suspicions eased.  Then he could look for the ring again.

Pam looked at him closely.  “Oh really?  I think you're lying.”  She laughed.  “What IS this?” she said, looking at him carefully.  Mark felt his super-strength vanish in a flash, although he reasoned still had his other powers.  “Somebody’s keeping a big secret from his girlfriend.  That’s not nice, is it?”  She walked closer.  Mark tried to use his super breath to blow her away, but his weakened muscles produced little more than a sigh.  It seemed his loss of strength also negated his super speed and his flying power, and although his invulnerability kept her hold from hurting him, she made him too weak to break it.

“So, what’s it going to be, Mark?" she said.  "Are you going to tell me the full story, or am I going to make you too weak to get out of bed?"
112.title: Girls can take away a man’s strength if h...

choices: in a happy relationship
having a bit of trouble in their relationship
are not in a relationship
1123.content:
Becca’s next date with John

It was Friday night.  From Becca’s perspective, so long as she had been dating football players Friday night hadn’t been much fun.  Like most of the other players, John always insisted on an early night, with no sex, so that he was rested and fully “charged” for Saturday’s game.  But in the new world she had created, where men did not play competitive sports, John was free Friday to take her out.  Although it felt strange, it was nice, better than hanging out with the girls, or washing her hair, or, especially, studying.

She wanted to go to the movies but John was strangely reluctant, even when she offered to let him choose. “I don't know, Becca.  Are you sure it’s a good idea?  You know what could happen in a dark movie theater.”

“Really?  What?” Becca asked, looking up at him “innocently”, while snuggling into his strong body and grinding her hip seductively against his crotch. “What bad thing can happen?” 

John sighed.  “Well, if you insist,” he said, but he looked worried.

Even though Becca had told John to pick any movie he wanted, he couldn’t name any one he wanted to see, so they ended up at the latest rom-com, “Losing It”. John stuck close to her once they arrived.  He was virtually the only man at the theater, and Becca felt a little bad making him see what was obviously such an “chick-flick”.  She resolved to make it worth his while. He wanted to go right to their seat in the dark.  Becca thought was cute that he was so eager, but making him wait a little would only make him more so.

“Why don't you get us some popcorn while I excuse myself for a minute?” she suggested, giving him a little squeeze.  

John seemed to go pale.  “Do you ... have to?” he asked, looking around the theater nervously.  

Becca rolled her eyes.  “Yes I do.  Just find us some seats in the back.  You know why!” she smiled and gave him a quick kiss before turning away.  She didn't have to turn around to know John was watching her round ass wiggle as she walked toward the ladies’ room.

John walked tentatively to the snacks counter.  All around him girls were staring at him and giggling.  He tried to ignore them and what they were saying.

“What's she thinking!”

“He’s cute!”

“I’d take him with my Combo!”

“I just don't see why she wants to get rid of him.”

John looked anxiously back at the bathrooms, but she was still inside, probably on one of those long female lines.  He was sweating.  It was almost his turn.  Three high school girls were in front of him, turning around and looking at him and whispering to each other.  They ordered and left, and he bought the popcorn.  Becca still wasn't out.  He was carrying the popcorn into the theater, when it suddenly started feeling heavier.  Oh no!  A feminine arm hooked around his and pulled him to the side.  Another hand lifted the popcorn from his grasp.  Two more hands pushed him from behind, propelling him to an empty part of the building.  It was the girls who had been in front of him.

“You’re cute.  Are you in college?” said the first, a skinny blonde girl.

“What are you doing all alone, sweetie?” said the second, who was dark-haired and busty.  She leaned into him and almost knocked him down.

“Why’d your girlfriend leave you?” said the third.  She had bright red hair and wore a halter top that showed off her toned abs and traced her finger down his chest.

“Please let me go,” he said.  “She’ll be right out.”

“Naah.  I'm sure she left.  If she wanted you she’d of stayed with you,” the busty one said, and the other girls nodded.  “We didn't think we’d find a guy like you here tonight, or we would've dressed up more.”

“Which of us do you like best?” the redhead asked.  “Amanda’s the smartest, I’m the fittest, and Geri’s got the hooters.” The three laughed.

“You should know it’s not safe for a guy to be out alone at night.  We thought we should take care of you, since she left you,” explained the blonde.  “It’s only right.”

“Yes, I know,” John said.  “But I didn't want to come, and I didn't want her to leave me.”

“You see!  You need us!” said the redhead.

“Or at least one of us,” the blonde added.  “to hold your strength and keep you safe.”

“Which one of you has it?” John asked.

“Guess!” said Geri, twisting her torso to show off her bust.

“Tell us who you like best and then we’ll tell you.”

“I bet you like Geri best,” said Amanda.  “Boys always do.  That girl you came with is even bigger, but Geri’s are nice.”

“She’s very pretty,” the redhead said.  “But she must be pretty stupid, or just mean.  By the way, I’m Angela.”

“What are you doing here?!  The movie’s about to start!” Becca said, looking very annoyed.

“You’re still here!?” Geri said, disappointed.

“What could I do?  You left me alone, and one of these three took my strength!  They, uh, wanted me to leave with them, thinking you might have abandoned me,” John said dropping his voice as he spoke, trying to keep his anger under control.  He had to be careful.  If he was angry at the girls they might not give him his strength back, and if he blamed Becca she would punish him later.  

Becca was confused.  John didn't do anything to these girls.  Why had they taken his strength away?

“If you wanted him, why did you leave him?” Amanda asked.

“We were just taking care of him, and his strength,” Geri added. 

“Yeah, lots of other girls might have taken him.  They were all looking at him,” Angela said.

“All right.  All right.  Just give him back his strength.  All of it,” Becca said in a highly-pitched, demanding voice.  John stood straighter.  “Now get out of here!” she said even more loudly.  The girls laughed at Becca and then sauntered away, looking hard at John.

“I’m sorry, darling.  I didn't think anybody would do such a thing to you!” she said, snuggling next to him.  

John put his arm around her.  “Yeah, Becca, well, ok.  But, I mean, Jeez, this is exactly why I didn't want to go out!  Why do you think there aren't any guys here?”

“Because ... because ... it’s a chick flick!” she said.

John stared at her as though he only now perceived that she was a complete idiot.  Becca blushed deep red.  She could tell what he was thinking.  But how could she explain that all this was completely new to her, that even though she had “made” this world (which she couldn't reveal anyway!) she had no idea how things worked?  It was all so embarrassing!   

The problem was, these girls were taking away John’s strength without any good reason.  That wasn't fair!  Girls could be mean, of course, and weren't always trustworthy, but Becca had made this change to protect them, not so that they could steal people’s boyfriends, or bully guys or stop them from playing sports!

The lobby was empty.  The movie had begun.  “So, uh, Becca, what are we doing?” John said.  “Do you still want to see the movie?  I bet all the seats at the back are taken.”

Becca knew she could fix that in a second with the ring, but she wasn't in the mood.  She was feeling too stupid.  “No, let’s just go back,  I'm really sorry.  Will you forgive me?”  Still holding onto him, she leaned away slightly, letting him look down her blouse.  He looked, automatically, but his heart wasn't in it.  Now Becca was really concerned.  Making the world a better place was important, but she didn't want to lose John.  Not this way.

The problem was, John was her boyfriend, and those girls had no right to interfere.  They should have minded their own business.  As long as John was going out with her, then no other girl should be able to take his strength away.  Then they could go out together, and he wouldn't have to worry.  She smiled at how easy it was.  

“I want to change things again,” she told the ring, “so that if a guy is going out with someone, or is married or something, then only that girl can take his strength away.  So, basically, only the girl he’s closest to will have the power to take his strength. That will be fairer.”

“If you say so,” the ring replied.

There was a shimmer in the fabric of the universe, and now we see what Becca’s decision does for guys who are ...

The trouble was that Alex wasn't pretty, and she was very aware of this fact. Alex smiled wide. "That's good, because there are a lot of things that I want."

Alex was eavesdropping on Pam, who was chatting cattily with Sara Gates. They were laughing about boys they knew.  Each of Pam’s statements slighting Mark made Alex more upset.  

How could she say he dressed like a geek?  He was so cool not to care too much about superficial things!

How could she laugh at his runner’s physique?  Mark could be bigger if he wanted, but he obviously decided fitness was more important than just piling muscle on muscle.  

How could she complain that he spent too much time studying and not enough on her, or that he didn't work hard enough to get just the right gift for her birthday?  Wasn't the reason obvious?  That was no flaw!  He just didn't care that much about her!

“Yeah, yeah, and you how ALL guys are ’breast men’?” Pam was saying, pulling her blouse down to accentuate her well-shaped but hardly enormous bust.  “All you have to do to distract them is shake these around a little and they totally lose their train of thought.  I mean, how pathetic is that!”  Pam shook her shoulders, let her boobs swing and they both laughed, while Alex looked down at her meager “assets”.  She reddened with shame and envy.  Boys never reacted to her like that.  They probably didn't even know she WAS a girl!  Stupid boys!  Stupid body!!  She was about to use her ring to change EVERYTHING when her ears caught something else.

“But ... well, ok, he can be both, but girls don't have muscles, not really.”  Sara was holding out her long, slender arm.  “It’s boys who have the muscles.  Why would he like that?”

“I don’t know!  You think boys make ANY sense?!  And they think WE’RE illogical!”

“Yeah ... but what do you mean, he likes muscles.  He likes you, right?  I mean, you have a little muscle, more than me, but, I mean --”

“Yeah.”  She did a quick bicep flex and laughed.  “This lil’ ol’ muscle doesn't interest him.  After I found that stuff I tried flexing a couple of times, but he just looks away. I guess I'm not big enough.  His fantasies are kind of different.  I saw it all on his computer one day, when he left and the password hadn't kicked in.  He has a whole directory hidden with his science labwork, full of pictures of girls with muscles, big muscles, a lot bigger than his, for sure.”  She grinned.  “You should see some of them.  And then he also has stories.  Some of them are really bad!”  

“I don't get it.”

“Me neither, not really, but listen.  I checked which were his favorites, you know, by how many times he read them, and then I copied the whole lot of them on a memory stick so I could read them without rushing, to see what I was missing about him.”

“Wow!  Like you're seeing right into his brain!  So tell me!”

“This what I found.  It’s not just a physical thing.  It’s not only the muscles, it’s about power.  And it’s not a masochistic thing, it’s about superiority, not pain.  And it's not only a domination thing.  His favorite stories are all about losing power, about becoming more helpless, about fighting back, and losing to the girl.  Like she’s taking the power away from him.  That really turns him on.”

Sara stared at Pam intently.  “I'm sorry, I really still don't get it.  Is it a turn off for you?”

”Not really. I thought it was strange at first, but then I decided it was a good thing.  I mean, if deep down he wants to lose power to me, well, hey, I don't mind having the power in the relationship.  So I've been working out, especially my arms cause he likes biceps, and kind of ramping up the bossiness, a little, being more aggressive, emotionally AND physically, seeing if he goes with it.  I mean, he just might find it irresistible.  You know?”

Sara laughed.  “Oooh!  You're evil!  Enslaving him with his own secret fantasy!”

“It’s not evil.  It’s what he wants, right?” Pam laughed.

“Well, is it working?”

“I'm not sure.  I think a part of him feels threatened, but on another level he’s really turned on -- you kind of notice these things as a girl, you know?”

“Oh!  really?”

“Uh huh.  Even though he’s fighting it, I’ll keep going with it and see what happens.  Worst comes to worst, I’ll write it up for Psychology.  Or maybe Cosmo.”

“You ARE evil!”

“Heh, heh.  Only a little.”

Alex was fuming.  She talked quietly. “Ring, can you do things to her?”

“Of course.  I can do anything to her that you can conceive.”

“Oooh, I hate her so much! Take her boobs away.  Make her as flat as she was when she was 7.  And change her top to something really tight, with no bra!  She won't need one.”

Pam was thinking about the next step in her plan for Mark, but she felt a bit chilly, and lighter.  “Huh?  What do you mean?”  Something in her field of vision seemed wrong and she glanced down ... and screamed.  “Agghhh!  What happened?!!!  My boobs!!”

Alex was fascinated by the scene.  She wanted to ask the ring to let her see what Pam was doing, all the way to her room, to hear what she was saying, to know what she was thinking.  She’d forgotten to take her muscles away too, to make her as weak as Sara, or weaker.  Then she wouldn’t be able to tempt Mark at all!  

But Mark was more important.  Now that she knew all this  she could make sure SHE was the one he wanted.

After several hours and four cups of tea she finished the first six books.  “Ring, I am so happy!  I KNEW Mark and I are were perfect for each other before, and I was so right!  Having complete superiority and power over him is what I want, and it’s what he wants too, even though he doesn't know it!  We are so lucky!  Now, where is he?”

“Superman is badly hurt, and Mark has been super for only 9 hours.”

The ring paused.  “Just normal Mark Harding, as you know him.”

“I'm really confused.  How did he become so powerful?”

“He found the ring and used it, but then he took it off and it has found it’s way to you.”

Understanding what happened took several seconds to resonate through Alex.  “Poor Mark!” she finally exclaimed.  

The ring waited.

“He doesn't know!  He has no idea, no conscious idea!”

The ring waited.

“He’s up there, with all the power in the world, beating Superman, ogling girls from a distance, but he has no idea how to make himself truly happy!  But it’s all happened for a reason.  You, ring, have come to me for a reason.  Unconsciously, this is what Mark wanted, and now I’m going to make all our dreams come true!”

Alex took a deep breath.

“Ring, he shouldn't know how all this happens, so make him forget he had you and then ...

11322.content:
“...take away his superpowers and bring him here.”

“Dead or alive?”

“Alive, of course.”

“If I take away his powers now, he will die from cold and lack of air.”

Alex looked at the ring and sighed.  “Do I have to tell you how to do everything?”

“No, you have to tell me what and when, though.”

Alex felt as though the ring was looking up at her, grinning, thinking how superior to her it was.  That’s how people always acted.  The ring was just the same!  She was tempted to rip the ring from finger and throw it out the window.  That would show it!  She got as far as putting her fingers on it and tugging, when she realized what she would lose.  Instead, she closed her thumb and forefinger around it and squeezed hard for ten seconds.  There!  That showed it who was boss!

She opened the “Super-Powers” book and leafed through, looking for a particular story.  “Ah!  Make a meteor hit him in the shoulder.  It breaks apart.  He wobbles a bit in orbit.  His super-vision fades.  He starts to fall.  He feels his super-strength going.  But it’s not gone, not yet.  Ok what’s he doing?”

“He looks anxious.  He’s brushing the meteor dust off his shoulder.  He’s heading back to Earth.”

“Where?”

“Toward Africa.  He can't see where he’s going.  His vision is normal, so he can't see through the clouds.”

Alex bit her lip hard, almost drawing blood.  She hadn't thought things through, as usual.  And the ring hadn't warned her.  She wanted to squeeze the ring again to punish it, but there wasn't time.  “Take away half his flying power so he’s losing control, and change his course back toward campus.  He’s still invincible, completely, so he won't get hurt, but take away 75% of the powers he’s got left, and I want him to feel it happen.”

“He’s very upset.”

“He’ll be happier, in the end.  I know it.  Where is he now?”

“Nearly here.”

“Make him crash in the woods, out of control.  As soon as he's standing, take all the rest of his powers away.  Make him feel it.  Make him feel like he's weaker than before, but just by comparison to having super-powers.  ’Cause he won't really be weaker than before, not yet.”

“It's done.  He’s staggering back toward campus.”

“I want to see what Pam’s doing.  Awwww, still crying! Good.  She won't be going to Mark’s room now, not the way she looks.  Give her a little paunch in her belly.  Bigger. Perfect.  I like the way it makes that little t-shirt separate from her pants!”

Alex was smiling broadly. “Now me.  I need to be bigger on top, but not a lot.  Maybe a ’B’, for once in my life!  Or just a little bit big for a ’B’ cup.”  She looked down.  “Yeah.  But a bit bigger than that.  And firmer. And rounder.  Uh huh, and just a tiny bit bigger.  Not THAT tiny.  C’mon.  More.  More.  A little bit more.  Ok.  No.  More.  Ok.  That’s better, but it took forever! Jeez, you have a lot of powers but you don't know anything about breasts, do you?”

The ring was silent.  

Alex turned her torso and admired her profile in the mirror.  “Don't you have anything to say for yourself?”

“I do not have a self.”

“Ha ha.  Yeah, right.  You use the word ’I’, you have kind of a sense of humor, although it’s not the kind I think is funny, at all, and you like to make trouble, but you say you don't have a ’self’?  Yeah, whatever that means!”

The ring was silent.  

“I don't want to change my face, or it wouldn't be me, but make my skin pinker and less oily, and I want my hair a richer color.  It’s so blah.  Yeah, more.  More.  That's good.  And I need more hips and butt, to balance what I've got on top now.  Uh huh.  Hey!  Uh huh, uh HUH!  Beats putting on makeup.  Get it?  Yeah.  What's he going to think of me NOW!”

“He won't know it’s you.”

“Ha!  You can say that again!  He hasn’t noticed me since before high school, when the other girls started getting curves and I didn't.  Just these tiny nubs instead of breasts, and no hip and no ass. Ha!  Not anymore!  I’d stand in front of him and he wouldn't even notice I was there.”  Alex was getting angrier.  “He doesn't even know I followed him here to Local State or that I have three classes with him, which I don't even like!  He doesn't even know we’re in the same dorm!!”  

The ring was silent.

“Well!  He’ll do more than notice me now.  The next time he WILL see me.  And then he’ll see me change his life!  Both our lives!”  She struck a pose in front of the mirror.  “Ooooh.  Sexy!” She turned her hips from side to side and grinned, but when held her arm up and flexed her biceps she frowned.  “Just look at that!  No muscle at all!  I’m worse than Sara Gates!”  She glared at her image angrily. “That is so pathetic. Ring, Show me what my arm would look like with Mark’s muscles.  In the mirror.  Oooh!  That’s a little better.  Look how it curves up.”  She stared at it critically but then frowned.  “But Pam said some of the girls in the pictures had bigger muscles than Mark.  What if this isn't big enough?  How big a muscle would I have if I were twice as strong as him?  Oooh!  Look at that!  Three times?  Four?  Wow!  It’d be really hard too!” She shifted position, looking at her reflection straight on.  “How would the rest of me look?”  She gasped.  “Those shoulders!  That chest!  It makes my bust look even bigger!  I feel so powerful just LOOKING at myself.  I can’t imagine what Mark will think!”  She was breathing hard now.  Her face flushed and her hand drifted down to her crotch and started rubbing herself through her jeans.  “Oh ... god!  This is gonna be ... so in..CRE..di..ble!” She rubbed harder, then faster.  Then she stopped short.  “Oh god!!  Where is he?”

113222.content:
After what began as the best day Mark ever imagined, now everything was back to normal, and normal felt crushing.  He had been the most powerful being on Earth, maybe the universe, more super than Superman.  Then, struck by a random meteor, he lost it all.  Landing near school was as much a miracle as getting his powers, which strangely he could not remember, but that wasn't the point.  He could have done anything, taken anything, had any girl, beaten any man, and now he was just a normal man.  The thought that he was a mere plaything, the butt of a cosmic joke occurred to him, but he wasn't the philosophic or religious type, and the thought faded quickly.   The feeling of injustice remained.  He looked at the other students, guys who were stronger than he or better with girls, girls who would never give him a second look but would have been at his feet, begging for his notice, just half an hour ago.  Now, they noticed only his bedraggled clothes, or didn't notice him at all.

Nearly back to the dorm, he considered and rejected going to Pam for comfort.  She had been acting strange lately, even more bossy and aggressive than usual.  That wasn't what he wanted.  A long shower, takeaway pizza and beer, a locked door and then something to forget the day.  It wouldn’t take much.  A few favourite pictures and stories from his private folder would top it off.

“Hey, uh, Mark,” said an oddly familiar voice.  He turned, confused, to the girl.  He knew the voice but didn't know why.  He knew the nose and eyes, but there was nothing familiar about the body.  She was nearly as tall as he, but she looked bigger, with a massive “DD” bust, round hips and butt. She must weigh at least 20 pounds more than his slim runner’s body.  He stared harder, trying to place her.  She wasn’t ’beautiful’, but that body!  How could that body know his name without him knowing hers?

“Come on, Mark! It’s me, Alex.  Alex.  From home?  Alex.  Alexandra. Alexandra York.”

“Alex?” he said, his eyes ranging up and down, trying to register how Alex could possibly go with that body.  Although ... he hadn't seen her in years, since high school, and girls’ bodies did develop, sometimes unexpectedly. “What are you doing at Local State?”

“I GO here, Mark,” she said, a step closer.

“You do?  I ... Are you at Jefferson?”

“Noooo!  Here!” she said, slightly annoyed.  

“Here?  No!  Oh, you must have just transferred!  Where were you?  O.S.U.?” 

Alex sighed deeply, more annoyed, until the thrill of her breasts moving beneath her t-shirt and the resulting loss of eye contact with Mark more than compensated.  “No, silly, I came here right after I graduated, a year after you!”  She barely resisted adding she saw him daily at breakfast, walked behind him daily from the dorm to the classroom and sat exactly three rows behind him at ten lectures a week.

“Huh!  Funny how at a big school you don't run into some people,” he said.

“Yeah.  Um, do you want to come up and have some tea?  We can, you know, catch up.”  She pulled her t-shirt down to smooth it over her breasts, as she'd seen girls with breasts do for years, and thrilled again as Mark’s eyes went down.

Mark had mo taste for tea, and he felt hesitant about going to another girl’s room, especially in the same building where he and Pam lived.  Alex was more than a bit awkward, and he had another reason for avoiding her, so he started to excuse himself.  “Um, I kind of need a shower, and I have some --

“Oh, but I LIKE your smell!” she blurted out, then bit her lip and put her hand over her mouth.  She laughed awkwardly,  “I'm on the, uh, third floor,” she said and went toward the stairs.  Mark was sure it was a bad idea.  Then he noticed the lack of a bra strap under her pink tee and the heavy bouncing within it when she headed for the stairs went. Yes, she was even a bit more “off” than he remembered, but WHAT a body!  How could he have NOT noticed her?!  He followed her up.

Her room was bare, with a few picture frames quickly turned over as she walked in ahead of him, and a blown up poster of their class graduating picture over her bed.  There was a shelf of fancy leather-bound books, but no titles on the spines -- although he had thought he had seen titles when he first entered.  

Alex stood still while he looked at her room.  She only just remembered to get the ring to erase the story titles.  What else had she forgotten?  She couldn't make tea without water.  She couldn't get water without leaving.  Mark couldn't be alone in her room.  What if he saw something else or, worse, left?  She thought, “Ring, put fresh water in the heater!”

“Done.”

“Something wrong?” Mark asked.

“Um, no!  I ... I'm not used to having ... you ... here, you know,” she said, laughing nervously as she plugged in the water heater.  She put tea in the mugs.  “I really think you’ll like it,” she said, while thinking, “Ring, once we both drink the tea, he’ll start getting weaker and smaller, while I get bigger and stronger, until I think ’stop’.”

“Um, ok.  I’ve never been into tea, but I’ll try it.”  The room was small and she was standing very close to him.  He couldn't stop looking at her chest.  He looked away to be less obvious but that felt worse, and every time he looked back at her his eyes went right back to her chest.  The water was heating noisily.  “Um, well, is this your favorite?”

“Yeah.  It’s, um, a special blend.”  

She turned to check on the water, which was just bubbling.  The twist of her body made her bust stand out even more.  She caught him staring.  He looked down.  There was an awkward silence.

“I guess we’ve changed a lot since we used to play together,” he said.

He immediately regretted how that sounded, but before he could change the topic she said, “Um, well, yeah, girls’ bodies really change.  Remember when we were, like 11, and all of a sudden I was, I don't know, a head taller than you?  Remember playing basketball?  I kept beating you.”

Mark looked at her, recalling how she’d shot up to as tall as she was now that year, while he was still more than a foot shorter.  “Oh yeah.  That summer.”

“That was fun,” Alex said and pulled her t-shirt down again to smooth it.  “I saw you lots, and I liked being able to beat a boy.  You especially.”  She laughed nervously.

“It was only that summer,” he replied defensively.  

Alex nodded and sighed heavily, enjoying the new feelings of two extra movements on her chest, and, again, Mark’s eyes.

The water was boiling.  Steam fogged the window.

Alex poured the water and handed Mark a mug.

“Tea’s really not my thing,” he said doubtfully.

“You’ll be surprised.  Really,” she insisted.  She took a long gulp and smiled.

Mark wondered what exactly he was doing in her room.  He could just put the mug down and leave, but being in his room by himself, reading his stash of stories or looking at images, didn’t appeal to him now.  Going to see Pam felt even worse.  So what was wrong with having a chat and a mug of tea with an oversexed version of Alex?  He took a sip.  It wasn't that bad.  He took a swallow.  Alex was watching him closely, probably wanting his opinion on the tea.  She was clearly interested in him.  He looked once again at her chest and let his eyes linger. With such big tits, it was amazing they didn't sag at all.  They actually seemed even larger and firmer than he had first thought.

“Do you mind if we, you know, sit down, together, while we drink?” she asked.

He shrugged.  “OK.”  

She sat on the bed and he sat a few inches away.

“Was losing to a girl that bad?” she asked.  “We kind of stopped being friends after that summer.  Were you mad at me?”

He had been mad, but he couldn't admit why.  It wasn't losing; it was some other, very new sensations he got when they played, when she won.  Was that summer the reason he liked stories of female muscle and dominance so much?  Or was his interest a pre-existing one, part of his DNA?  Was that why he played her again and again, even though her height, long arms and surprising, and most important, maturer strength compared with his still pre-pubescent muscles resulted in loss after loss?  And why he avoided her afterwards?

“No!  Of course not.”

“Oh, that’s good.  Because it really gave ME a thrill.  You know, I wish girls were stronger than boys.  We SHOULD be taller.  We should have bigger, stronger muscles, like the way it was with us that summer.”

“What?”  His body went rigid.  

She looked down and laughed. Her arm was much thicker now and her tee was getting very tight around her chest, clearly showing the shape of her breasts. He was just looking at was her chest, constantly looking at it, but soon he’d notice.  

“Why not?  Female bodies are better in so many other ways.  We live longer, have better immunity, have more endurance, handle stress better.  Why shouldn't we be stronger too?  It makes no sense that boys are better in just that one way.”

"Fine, fine!" He grumbled as he got back to his feet, the spell of Alex's amazing massage broken.

"OK, you made your point, you are a strong woman. Maybe you're almost as strong as I ... am... Alex???" He stood up and faced her again. His jaw dropping as he took in her herculean physique.

Alex giggled and flexed her biceps for Mark. It felt silly, awkward.

'Ring, give me the posing skills of a professional bodybuilder. And the stage presence and sexuality of a stripper'

The second pose worked much better, she flowed into it exuding sensuality and sex appeal as she held it just long enough. Her bicep bulged and rose spectacularly from her upper arm.

"So, like I was saying, how do you know I haven't spent the last two years transforming my body into an incredibly muscular work of art? How do you know I'm not the reigning state heavyweight bodybuilding champion? How do you know?"

'Alive or dead?'

Stupid ring. 'No, not like that! Just.. you know make her want to come knock on my door. I want her to see this. And give her her old body back. She can't compete with me now.'

While she waited she stepped closer to Mark and spread her lats wide.

"Would you like to touch me Mark? Would you like to touch my muscles? Feel just how hard and strong they've grown? Don't be shy, reach out and touch me."

Mark reached out to caress Alex's swollen shoulders. The muscles felt like warm steel, hard and impossibly strong. He tried to dig his fingers in, but coulnd't make a dent. Alex giggled at his pathetic effort.

Just then the door flew open and Pam stepped in. She took one look at Mark and shouted, "What the hell is going on in here? Mark??!"

Alex replied for Mark. "What does it look like, bitch? I'm taking your man. And there's not a thing you can do to stop me. Right Mark? Tell Pam to leave us alone. Tell her I'm your dream girl, and that she can never compete. Tell her it's over. Go ahead, tell her!"

Mark opened his mouth a few times, but no sound came out. He was overwhelmed. Finally he spoke and chose...

“That’s ridiculous.”

“No it’s not.”

Mark shook his head.  “Sure, there are some females who are stronger than some males, but it’s never going to be true as a general rule.  Even if girls work out, they start out smaller and they don't develop muscle as quickly or as much as guys.”

“Really?  Like as much as you?”

“Sure!  You were bigger than me, and maybe a little stronger for awhile, but only because you reached puberty first.  You ...” Mark paused, noticing Alex’s chest seemed even larger than before.  He stared, turned away and cleared his throat.  “You haven't been bigger or stronger than me since, and I'm not even the strongest guy around.”

“You think your being stronger than me proves your point.  Are you sure you are?”

“Of course I am!”

Alex smiled.  It was time.  “And you like it like that?”

“Huh?”  Mark stopped short.  She couldn't know about his ’interest’, unless it was something she knew from that summer.  “Why should it matter to me?”

“I mean, how would it make you feel if I had bigger muscles than you and were a lot stronger?”

“I don't know what you're getting at,” Mark said cautiously.  “You don’t, you’re not, and that’s that.”  The conversation was stupid, and Alex was more than a bit ’off’, but still it was starting to turn him on.  He shifted his legs uncomfortably.  He’d better get out of there.

“I think we should compare,” she said.  “You do your arm muscle first.”

He looked at her chest again.  It seemed even bigger.  Again.  Thoughts about Pam were quickly receding in his mind.  There were far worse things he could be doing than comparing body parts with this over-endowed girl.  “My biceps?  That’s ... well why not?”  he lifted his arm.  It looked strangely small and thin.  He made a fist and tightened it.  Not very much happened.  He tensed harder, and there was a movement along his forearm and a small rise in his upper arm, like before puberty, a boy’s muscle, not a man’s.  He pushed harder and it rose a tiny bit more, but there was no ball of muscle, no biceps pop.  “Huh?  What the fuck!”

Alex reached out, tentatively, and ran her finger along his upper arm.  She said, “That's kind of a small muscle, Mark.  You haven't really developed very much.  I guess that’s why you're a runner, huh?” She thought, ’Okay, ring, stop changing him, but I want to keep growing.’

Mark tried to pull away, but Alex closed her fingers around his upper arm and held him in place.  For the first time, unusually for Mark, he noticed her thick arm instead of just her breasts.  His eyes froze, and she saw it.  She turned her wrist, so that her biceps faced upwards showing the clear outline of a heavily  developed muscle.  His eyes goggled at the size, so distracting him that his resistance, limited as it was, ceased.   

Alex’s heart soared.  How he noticed!  It sent an electric current of pleasure through her body.  This was what she’d always wanted.  Now she wanted a lot more.

“See?  This is what I was talking about.  Look how much bigger my muscle is than yours.  This is what a girl’s body should be like, with big, powerful muscles, muscles that make me stronger than you, Mark.  Much stronger than you.”

“You can't be!”  He looked anxiously at her bulging muscle, then at his smaller arm, and then back at hers.

“Oh, I am.  You can flex your muscle all you want but no matter what you do it’s still going to be a lot smaller than mine.”

Mark stared at her arm in disbelief.  Alex can’t have muscles like these.  Not Alex!  Less than an hour ago he had been more powerful than Superman, then he lost all his powers, and now his muscles had shrunk too, and Alex -- plain Alexandra York -- not only had the most overdeveloped figure on campus, but she also had muscles that put his to shame!    And, compounding his shame, he was so turned on that each tiny movement sent paroxysms of pain through his groin.  He could never let Alex know.  She’d OWN him!

“So, come on Mark, tell me how you feel about it.  If your muscle’s so much smaller than mine, I’ve got to be the stronger one?  Right?”  She stretched out her arm, placing her upper arm just below his chin.  “Do you really think YOUR lil’ muscle is stronger than THIS?”  She closed her fist and her muscle bunched higher and then she slowly brought her fist up, making her muscle bulge more and more, all the while thinking, ’Ring, make my muscles even bigger.  Bigger.  Bigger, yeah, and harder and stronger!  Yeah, good.  Big enough. For now.’  Mark’s gasp was the sweetest sound she had ever heard.  His face flushed and his lips trembled.

He stood up shakily.  She stood up too, rising more than a head taller than he, so that he was looking only into her chest, the distorted letters of “girls” mocking him. She raised her other arm and flexed both biceps.  Her round muscles soared above the lines of her arms, and her chest expanded, creating deep stress lines in the light cotton of her tee.  Mark’s erection strained against his pants as his eyes shifted from biceps to biceps, as they seemed to grow more each time he saw them.

Mark was shaking his head, muttering as if to himself.  “No, no, no, no.  Something’s wrong here.  I’m not smaller than Alex.  I can't be this weak, and she can't be this strong.”

“Hey, Mark!  If you don't believe it, try to lift me.  See for yourself.”

In a daze, Mark put his arms around Alex, just below her chest and was barely able to close them to lock his hands.  As hard as he tried he could do no more than press against her thick musculature, compressing and raising her breasts slightly but leaving the rest of her body in place.  After 30 seconds he let out an exhausted “Oomph!”

“No!  Where did you get such a crazy idea?  Put me down!”

Alex looked surprised.  “But I'm making it all real for you.  Why won’t you admit it’s what you wanted?”  She paused, confused and then her face lit up with a flash of understanding.  “Oh, I get it.  This is part of your thing!”

1133.content:
As Alex set her sights on Pam and Mark she didn't notice that Becca and John were exiting the dorms about a hundred feet behind her.

John was frantically scanning the ground all over the place, looking for something. Becca led him to the area below her window which was near the coffee shop seating.

"Tell me again, what did it look like?" John asked somewhat frantically.

"I don't know. It was gold, but not pretty. Kinda dirty. I think it had a dent on one side." Becca said. 

After John had crashed into Becca while carrying Chad and Clem he had come to his senses. He realized that he had just been carrying two nearly three hundred pound football players in the air with little to no trouble. That shouldn't have been possible. Then he noticed that his shirt was extra tight and, in a few places, ripping open from the strain of his muscles. Muscles that were now clearly larger than they'd been minutes earlier. He had flexed his right arm and watched with a mix of confusion and glee as his sleeve tore apart around his giant bicep.

"Whoa! What the hell happened to me?" he'd said.

Becca had simply stared at John's new body for a moment before the answer came to her. "It must have been the ring."

"What ring?" John was now pumping his arm in and out, fascinated by the motion and expansion taking place beneath his skin.

"It said it could do anything I wanted. I remember thinking that I wanted you to be stronger than Chad, then you were." Becca stood up and looked out the window.

"That's not-" John was about to point out the impossible nature of what Becca was describing, the looked at his beefed up chest and shoulders and realized that no matter how insane it sounded he was clearly stronger than Chad now. He was probably stronger than anyone else on campus now, and if there was some ring that could give him more he needed to have it. "Where is it? Can I see it?"

"I think it flew out the window when you crashed into me."

"Come on!" John grabbed Becca by and hand and yanked her down the hall leaving Chad and Clem behind to nurse their wounds.

Now John was searching through the bushes outside the dorm while Becca scanned the ground and the tables. Then she spotted it, it had to be the right one! It was dingy and dented just like she'd remembered. Some plain looking girl was wearing it. 

"John! There it is, on that girl's hand!"

John turned and lunged at the girl Becca was pointing at. He grabbed her by the wrist and held her up.

"What are you doing?" Alex yelled. John gripped the ring and began sliding it off of her finger. "That's my ring!!" She clenched her fist to keep John from taking it, but he was very strong and quickly prying her fingers open again. 

"No, it's my ring!!" Becca yelled in Alex's face. "I want it back."

"Ladies," John said, "I think I'm going to have to claim this as mine."

Meanwhile, Alex was screaming in pain as John had carelessly broken her finger. The ring was off Alex’s hand and was balanced between John’s thumb and forefinger. He was about to transfer it to his pinkie, when, consistent with Alex’s last command, it popped out of his hand and into the air. He caught it, but as he got ready again to slip it onto his finger it slipped out again, bounced off a stone, landed in the road and rolled downhill until it hit a speed bump, popped into the air and into the hand of ...

113311.content:
Liz was exhausted and completely out of breath. It had been over a month since she started training for the campus 10K run, but she felt like she hadn't made any progress at all. She still fell far behind everyone else from the beginning of the run, she still felt winded after a few blocks, and worst of all her body still jiggled and shook with every step she took. She wasn't THAT overweight, but she was soft all over, and running only made it look and feel worse.

She knew her face was bright red from the exertion, and the embarrassment she felt from her loud breathing and coughing was only making it worse. The other girls had already recovered. They were drinking water and laughing and talking to each other, while she was so winded she could hardly breathe, much less talk. Not that they would talk to her anyway. They were all students, TAs or professors, or wives of students, TAs or professors. They all probably considered themselves above her, a mere book stacker in the library. Occasionally she would see them look at her and smile. Liz couldn’t tell if they were mocking her or simply lacked interest. Either way, it made her feel miserable and excluded.

And then there were the guys. All but one treated her as though she was completely invisible, and the attention of the exception, Tom, was worse than being ignored. Clearly an outsider himself, Tom kept trying to work his way in to the group by making insulting remarks at her, saying things like “if running's too hard, just roll to the finish line” or “she's so fat lets save time and run around her for exercise.” No one gave him anything more than a polite laugh, but they didn't defend her either.

It wasn't that she was looking for a boyfriend. She had Barry, and she had been happy with him the last few months when their relationship had suddenly moved to the next level. Like her, he was overweight and not tall, although considerably taller than her. But standing on her own on campus, chest still heaving, ignored by the other runners and mocked by Tom, the thought of Barry back in the rooms they were sharing just off campus, comfortably watching TV, snacking, and not doing any exercise or cleaning or getting dinner ready annoyed her. It was his fault she had to put up with this. Sure, it was good for her to get into better shape, but that wasn't why she was here. It was all because of a little talk they'd had a few months ago.

Almost since they'd met, even before they became a couple, they had played little fantasy games about her physically dominating him. It started when they saw Superman fly over their heads. Liz had commented about how awesome it would be so powerful. To her surprise Barry said the same thing, except he said that it would be awesome if SHE were so powerful. It sounded odd to her. Why would he want HER to be the strong one? She was almost always the smallest adult in the room, being the weaker and smaller one was normal for her. There was nothing sexy or exciting about other people being stronger than she was, or looking up to them. For a few weeks she thought over and over why Barry found the idea attractive, but she couldn't come up with an answer. But it was obvious that he liked talking about it, and eventually she decided that being able to talk about his fantasy was one of the reasons he went out with him. His behavior in bed confirmed it, so she simply accepted that was the way he was, even if she didn't fully understand it. It certainly didn't do any harm!

But although both of them found the idea exciting in theory, the impracticality of the unathletic, 5'2" Liz physically dominating her stocky 5'9" boyfriend was clear from the very beginning. Perhaps trying to act out the fantasy was why she had started gaining weight. Her increasing bulk gave some more "substance" to the game of wrestling and pinning him, even though they both knew he could still push her off and pin her whenever he wanted. Still, one day Barry announced that play wrestling wasn't enough. He wanted her to get into shape and develop some real muscle. She tried to argue that exercise and building muscle didn't come naturally to her, but the more she argued, the more worried she became that she would burst the little fantasy bubble he was enjoying and lose him, so she backed down and agreed to use the university gym and join the running club. But she feared she was only postponing the problem. Her genes were against her. As much as she worked out, she remained overweight with muscles like jello. Now she was worried Barry would stop finding her attractive and would leave her. It was so unfair! Didn't he realize they were perfect for each other? Why couldn't he leave well enough alone and keep it all as a fantasy!

The fact was, annoyance was a mild way of describing her current feelings about Barry’s plan.

She waved an unacknowledged goodbye to the group and turned around to walk home, but before she took two steps, something banged hard against her foot. Had Tom just thrown something at her!? She looked down at her shoe and saw a dingy ring. No one seemed to be looking for it, so she bent over tiredly, picked it up and slipped it on her pinkie to examine it. Suddenly her exhaustion vanished. What the hell?

Nothing hellish at all, a voice said in her head. Whatever you can conceive you can have, so long as you wear the ring.

Her mouth dropped open in astonishment, but before she had time for another thought a very large and muscular boy appeared next to her, followed by one of the most beautiful girls she had ever seen and a thin girl with an odd expression close behind.

"Hey, that's my ring! Give it back!" the boy said and put his hand on her shoulder, stopping her from moving.

"Huh? But ..."

"But, no! It's mine, John! Make her give it to me!" the beautiful girl said.

"I had it last! I need it so Mark will like me!" the odd girl insisted.

Liz was confused, but two thoughts came to her. If all three of them wanted it, it must be worth having. And if all of them were fighting for it, it probably didn't belong to any of them. She probably had as much right to it as any of them did.

John pushed the second girl away with just two fingers and she went sprawling onto the grass. He turned to Becca. "Now don't you worry your pretty head, Becca. When I get it I'll be SURE to use it to give you everything you need, you know what I mean? I'll make you even MORE of a knockout. I’ll just get it from the fat girl and then the fun will begin!" John grabbed Liz's hand and started pulling at the ring, but, thanks to Alex's command his fingers kept slipping. He grimaced. "DAMN. I must be too sweaty!" He grabbed her wrist hard. "Take it off, fatty, and give it to me!"

Liz saw stars from his grip and the pain shot up her arm into her shoulder. He was so strong! She would never be able to keep the ring from him. She looked at the muscles bursting out all over his body. Those were the kinds of muscles she wanted to have, the kind Barry fantasized about, the kind of muscles she could never.... But the thought came into her head. She had been thinking the ring would be good for giving her things, but what if it could change HER. That John was talking about making that girl even more beautiful, and maybe he had gotten his strength and muscles from the ring? And if he had, couldn't she?

Can you give me his muscles, Liz thought, and give him mine?

Of course, the ring replied.

Nothing happened. He was squeezing harder. Her wrist was about to snap in two.

Would you? Liz thought. Like now? Suddenly she felt herself shifting, as if her bones and muscles were moving under her skin. The grip on her wrist weakened.

She watched in awe as the fat in her arms quickly turned into hard bulging muscle, larger and thicker than the fat that it replaced, while John's arms became thinner and thinner, his enhanced athletic muscle turning into droopy feminine fat. She flexed her right bicep and it rose up against the baggy sleeve of her shirt and started stretching and then tearing it.

“Wild!” she said aloud as she flexed her other arm. “I must be so strong!” she said to herself as she flexed her thighs and calves. She pumped her fist into the air. “Whoo hoo!” she said excitedly. She looked at John, whose body now was swimming in his clothes.

"Hey! You can't do that to me!” he cried out. “I need those muscles for football!"

Liz grinned. "Oh yeah? Well, I need them for something more important. I need them for love!" She put her hand on his chest and pushed and he tumbled backwards. "Cool! This is like being super! Wait 'til I show Barry! Oh yeah! I'm REALLY going to show him something!"

The beautiful girl stood in her way and whined. "But it's MY ring. I want it back!"

Liz looked up at her. "Hey, would you like to be short, fat and ugly?"

The girl's eyes widened. She looked at Liz and shook her head slowly, back and forth.

"Then shut up and get out of my way!"

The girl swallowed and Liz marched past her, striding confidently home, thinking carefully how she was soon going to enjoy for real her greatest fantasy with her boyfriend.
113311.title: Liz, the Library Book Stacker
