1133112.content:
Liz was so excited she half wanted to run home, burst through the door and wrestle Barry into complete submission. But why rush? She had the power to fulfil every fantasy she'd ever had, whenever and wherever she wanted. Why do it all at once? Better to take time to think through exactly how she wanted to do it.

She told the ring to shrink her back to her normal size and fix her clothes so that Barry would think nothing had changed. By the time she turned the key in the door she was tingling in anticipation. There would be a magic stone, from another dimension, some pizza delivered, of course, and Superman too! If Barry only knew! But he’d find out soon enough, the dear man, and soon to be her poor little dear man!

"Hey sweetie, I'm home. Did you make dinner?" she asked, knowing he never did.

"Umm, no. I just got home too," Barry said from the sofa. He was in his shorts and t-shirt, had his IPAD balanced on his knee and his second beer in his hand, an empty at his feet. Liz guessed had just started his third episode of Family Guy. He always got home early on Fridays. She pretended to be annoyed and grumbled to herself.

"How was your run?" Barry asked.

"Umm, same as always,” she said grumpily. “Nothing's changing! I'm going to quit."

"What?” he said, surprised, turning away from the screen for the first time to look at her. “But you can’t! We talked about it! You need to just keep it up. You know, um, how I feel about, I mean, how WE feel --

"I know. I know."

"I mean, I'm just naturally so much bigger than you. And stronger. If you don't work at it you'll never --

"I know what you're going to say! But it’s not fair, you know? Why does it have to be such hard work for me? You just sit around and do nothing and you’re still so much stronger than me."

"Um, well I can’t help that, can I? That’s just the way we’re made, but we’re trying to deal with it, you know? It’s not like we could do anything else about it." Liz got this way sometimes, and Barry really did not want a fight on Friday night. “We can order a pizza, ok? And then watch My Super Ex-Girlfriend for, uh, some inspiration.” It was one of their favourite movies to watch together. It always got them in the right mood.

Liz pretended to think it over. "Well ... maybe. I’m going to order from a new place then.”

“But ... well, ok.” If that’s what he needed to do to get her back in a good mood then he’d do without his favorite, Pizza Palace, for one night. She picked up her iPhone and tapped out their usual order. “If only that movie could be real, you know? What I'd do to you if I were super-strong!”

“I know! That would be incredible,” Barry agreed emphatically, although he was glad at the moment that she wasn't. Liz was hard enough hard to handle as it was when she was in a bad mood. A super-powered pissed-off Liz was not something he wanted to deal with. Sometimes he thought her getting stronger was not the greatest idea. But since it would never really happen anyway, he could indulge in the fantasy and act though it could.

“Oh, I found something interesting while I was out running." Liz reached into her pocket and pulled out a small, pink stone. It was very bright, like bubble gum, and had a faint glow.

"That's a funny color, like it's from a child’s toy," he said.

"I know. The weird thing is, it wasn't pink when I found it. It was grey, and I think it was a little smaller."

Barry frowned. "That doesn't sound possible. Let me see."

Liz laughed outside and inside, saying "Oh yay! Barry the geologist will now examine the rock!" while thinking, ’boy, are YOU going to get a surprise!’ She walked over to him and dropped the rock into his hand. Almost as soon as he held it the pink color dulled and the rock turned grey.

"Look at that!" he exclaimed. "It lost its color!"

"Hmmm! And now it's turning blue," Liz observed.

"Like litmus paper, when you take it from an acid solution to a base," Barry said looking up at her. "Maybe your hand was kind of acidic, like from your sweat."

Liz raised her eyebrows. It actually was an impressive deduction, even though it was completely wrong. Now!, she told the ring, and said, "Maybe, but look how blue it's getting. What would your hand have on it that's a base?"

"I don't ... hey, something's strange." He stared at the rock against his hand. "It got bigger."

Liz looked down at him. "No it didn't. But ... Barry ... I don't know how to say it ... are you smaller?"

"Huh?" He scrambled to his feet. He was still taller than Liz, but just by a few inches, and he was smaller all over his body. His arms and legs were thinner and shorter and his shoulders and hips were narrower. The rock was becoming a brighter and brighter blue. "What is this thing?" he said in a panic. He dropped the rock on the floor and kicked it across the room. He stopped shrinking, but was now just two inches taller than Liz. He was swimming in his t-shirt, and his shorts threatened to fall to his feet.

Liz was impressed by his quick reaction. It would leave “room” for more fun later. "Oh Barry!" Liz exclaimed. "Look at you!" He was trembling, so she put her arms around him and held him.

"This feels so weird! How could this have happened?!" he said, shaking. "I feel so small!"

"You're still taller than me, but yeah, I know. You're much thinner too. And I bet ... um, no, never mind."

"What? What were you going to say?" he said anxiously.

"Nothing. Really."

"Come on, tell me what you were thinking!"

"Um, it's just ... well, look at your arms. They're so thin, thinner than mine. You know? I mean, you know what we always talk about. That stone, um, must have taken away some of your muscle as well as your height. What if, um, I'm stronger than you now? You know, like in our little games?"

Barry shook his head. "Uh uh. No way. Your arms may be thicker, but it's all, you know, fat. You always say you don't have any muscle."

"I know, but I do have SOME muscle. When you were holding me before you felt kind of ... well, we can see later, I guess."

“Hold on! What are you saying?”

“Just that ... you felt really weak, ok? That’s all. Maybe you weren't really trying. But it’s no great disaster. Right?”

"Wrong! This is seriously bad! We have to DO something"

"Why? We both wanted me to be stronger than you. Maybe now it can happen, with you so much smaller and, maybe, probably, weaker too. And even if I'm not already stronger than you, I bet we’re a lot closer. And if you hold that rock again, you could shrink down to a couple of inches smaller than me. You can have arms as soft as a little girl’s, and I can push you around and dominate you easily Think about it! We should do it right now." Liz walked toward the rock.

Barry backed away. "NO! I don't want to shrink any more! Keep it away from me! And don't you touch it either! What if you shrink too?"

“But Barry! This is our big chance! Don’t chicken out!”

“No! I don't want to be a total weakling!”

“Hmmph! You’re happy for ME to go through all this exercise pain while you just sit around being naturally stronger, but when there’s something YOU can give up to make our fantasy come true, you won’t!”

“It’s not the same! Exercise is GOOD for you! Being weak sucks!”

“Yeah, tell me about it!” Liz put her hands on his shoulders as if she was going to shake him or push him, but then she dropped her hands, shrugged and walked over to the other side of the room, where Barry had kicked the rock. "I bet I AM stronger than you now."

“I seriously doubt it. But we can, um, pretend.”

She bent down over the rock. “It's so blue! Weird the way it changes color."

"Liz, be careful! Don't touch it."

It was sweet that Barry didn't want her to shrink too. Obviously he wouldn't want her to be even smaller than 5'2", and regardless of what he said she definitely liked the idea that they were so close in size now. She felt a little sorry for him now being so small, for a man, but on the other hand, he always said he wanted her to be bigger and stronger than him, and it was DEFINITELY what she wanted. It was time for part two. She didn't say anything and just picked up the rock.
1133112.title: Liz has a more complicated plan

choices: First power, then pizza
Another visitor interrupts them
11331122.content:
"OH!" she said, sounding startled.

"What is it? Drop it!" he shouted. "Before --

"No! It feels so good!" She turned toward him and held the stone tightly in her right hand. “Oooh, something’s happening. Are you shrinking again?”

Barry shook his head but said nothing, his mouth agape as he watched Liz’s head slowly rise. For a brief moment they were the same height, but soon he was looking up to her, while she happily looked back down at him from a height three inches above his.

“I'm taller than you!” she exclaimed walking up to him. “I'm taller! I’m taller!” She raised her arms up and jumped up and down excitedly.

“Liz! Quiet!” He put his hand on her shoulder to stop her but she kept jumping. He pushed down harder to hold her down but he couldn't, no matter how hard he tried. Her shoulders felt different too, not bony but fleshy. His hands slipped down to her upper arms. To his shock they felt sinewy, with harder bulges in the middle, instead of uniformly soft. “Liz, stop! Please! Hold still!”

“Huh? What?” she asked, reacting finally to his tone of voice and standing still. She patiently let him squeeze her arms. “What?”

“Liz! You've got ... muscles,” he said, his voice trembling slightly.

“Huh? Of course I have muscles. I told you. Everybody’s got muscles, silly. Even girls.”

“No, I mean ... not like before. They're bigger ... harder.” He squeezed again and Liz tightened her biceps a little in response, pushing them out against Barry’s fingers. “Oh!” he said.

“What?”

“Didn't you feel that?”

“Feel what? All I feel is your fingers on my arms.”

Barry pulled Liz’s arm up, but she resisted, playfully. He pulled harder. She held firm. “Ha ha. See? I told you that you were weaker.”

“It’s not just me! I'm trying to show you, if you’d let me. You’ve got bigger muscles. Hold your arm up and flex!”

Liz extended her arm and pulled back the sleeve of her t-shirt. Even without flexing, it was obvious that there was a bulge on her upper arm larger than Barry had ever had. “Oooh! Look at that!” Liz exclaimed. “Where did THAT baby come from!? I must be --

Just then the door rang.

“It must be the pizza. I’ll get it.” Liz grabbed her purse and opened the door to the largest, most muscular pizza delivery man anyone had ever seen. He was 6’2” with huge, bulging biceps, a barrel-like chest, and tree trunk legs. The abdominals on his tight waist showed through the clinging t-shirt he wore to coax tips from the girls and to threaten tips from men who were either eager to get him out of the door before their girlfriends swooned and lost all interest in them, or before they were beaten up.

“Oh my!” Liz said. “Aren't you a big one!”

He took a deep breath, extended his massive chest, held out the pizza boxes in a practiced gesture that accentuated his biceps, and began pumping them repeatedly. “That's one large extra cheese, extra pepperoni, and one medium veggie, double extra spinach. $31.25,” he said. “All additional toppings and service extras are, ahem, extra.”

Liz took two twenties from her purse. She stared at his enormous pulsing muscles, licked her lips and looked up into the pizzaman’s eyes. “What kind of extras?”

The pizzaman looked down with contempt at Barry and smirked. “That’s up to you, but you sure look like you could use some extra toppings. I’d say some extra large toppings.”

“We’ll see,” she replied and reached up to caress his massive chest with her left hand while her right hand pressed the two bills onto his large palm, the stone hidden beneath the money.

“Liz! What are you doing?!” Barry called out.

“Never you mind!” Liz replied.

The pizzaman smiled at first but then his brow furrowed. “Hey, I feel ....” He quickly shrunk to 6’. His astounding musculature was becoming less impressive with each second that Liz kept the stone pressed against his skin. “Wh-what's happening to me?” he whined, his formerly deep voice sounding reedy and nasal. He was just 5’6” now, with the build of a middle school wrestler. He stepped backwards toward the door but Liz still held his hand. Now he was down to 5’, nearly as thin as Barry, his arms lithe and sinewy but with no visible biceps. “I have to get out of here,” he piped, sounding like a prepubescent boy. He dropped the pizza boxes, the $40 and the stone and ran out the door, tripping on the bottoms of the pants and clutching the waist so they wouldn’t fall any further. The stone bounced onto the smaller pizza box and rested on top, the weight creasing it slightly.

Liz closed the door and stood over the stone. It was a deep blue, glowing as if radioactive, and nearly twice as large as it had been when Liz first showed it to Barry. "Oooh, Barry, he was so big! Just think about it. Can you imagine how strong I’ll be after I hold the stone? Unless you want to hold it a bit more first and give me more of your muscle and make me even bigger!"

Barry’s eyes went wide and he quickly shook his head. "I think you need to be careful.” He inched closer to her but kept a good three feet clear of the stone. “Think about it, Liz. What if it shrinks you, like it did to the pizzaman, or me? It did good to you once, but it's unpredictable. It did nothing the first time you touched it, and it shrunk him much faster than it did to me. I think we should quit while we're ahead. I mean, while you're ahead."

"Hmmmph. I don't know. Are you having second thoughts? Maybe you don't really WANT me to be so much stronger? Is that it?" She crossed her arms in front of her chest, making her thickened forearms more visible. "Well it’s too late! I already AM stronger than you, and I’m not stopping here, and you can’t do anything about it! Anyway, whatever you say, I know you don’t really want me to stop! You have that look in your eyes that you get whenever we’re talking about our little fantasy, the fantasy that’s already real and is just going to get even more fantastic. This stone is packed with power. Look at it GLOW! And it’s all for me! You don’t dare touch it, unless you want to risk getting even smaller and weaker than you are, but when I hold it it’s going to make make me so much more muscular. Look at my biceps even now! They’re bigger than yours ever were. Am I right?” Barry nodded. “Well, don’t you want to see what’s going to happen next?"

"Yes ... I do, of course I do, but ... this is such a big step. Why don't we talk it over first, while we have our pizza?" Barry said, pointing at the two boxes, "Before it, you know, gets cold."
11331122.title: The rock gives Liz more than what Barry lost

choices: They have the pizza at last
Liz forces  another dose of the stone on Barry
113311221.content:
Liz looked down at him. "Wait! You want to sit down, over our pizza, with that muscle-power-packed magic stone sitting on the floor ten feet away from us, talking about whether I should let that muscle-power-packed magic stone transfer to me all of the pizzaman's rock-hard, bulging, power-packed muscles, so that I can completely dominate you with my totally superior size and strength, so that I can flex my massive, power-packed muscles for you to desire, worship and envy, and so that we can both fulfil our lifelong fantasies, me to be all-powerful and dominant and you, heh, to have an all-powerful dominating girlfriend, but instead of that to go about like it's a normal Friday night, take out our dishes, pour our beers, and sit and eat and drink and just TALK about it? Instead of DOING it? Are you CRAZY?"

"Well ...."

"Heh, heh, well you just come here and try to stop me, you weak little man!" Liz bent down, grabbed the stone and slipped it under her t-shirt in the cleavage between her breasts. She leaned back and closed her eyes, revelling in the transformative energy radiating from the stone into her body, starting with her chest, which rapidly piled on pectoral muscles that pushed her breasts outward and upward, then to her shoulders and arms and then down through her abdominals to her butt and then her thighs and calves. The flow of power then moved back upwards, lengthening and thickening and strengthening her bones, expanding her legs from 32" to 38" so that she now stood over 6' tall, widening her shoulders and expanding her arms and hands. Barry looked on in awe as her t-shirt became tighter and tighter, molding itself to her growing chest and arms. When it stopped, she opened her eyes and pried the stone out from between her breasts and placed the glowing pink rock carefully on a cloth coaster, on the table in front of the sofa. She lifted her right arm and cautiously flexed her biceps, watching the muscle gather into a ball and push upwards, creating deep stress lines in the fabric of her sleeve. "Yeah! That's DEFINITELY more like it! That's POWER!"

With one step she closed all the distance between her and Barry and stood next to him, her head nearly a foot above his. With each breath, her bust pressed into his face, like a gentle punch. "ISN'T it, Barry? Am I the emBODIment of POWER, or what?!" She put her hands on him and effortlessly lifted him so that they were face to face. "Lifting your little body feels like NOTHING to me! I am SO strong, SO much stronger than YOU! I LOVE it!"

Barry looked down at her bulging biceps, which hardly flexed even though she was holding his whole weight. He couldn't believe how strong she'd become. He tried to cup them in his hand but they were too large, or his hands were too small. How could her muscles be so solid, so full? Could they really be Liz's?!

"You wouldn't believe how easy it is for me to hold you up. Look, baby! One hand!" she boasted as she wrapped her left arm around his body and cupped his behind to support him. While he was still trying to get the feel of the full size of her biceps, she used her freed hand to curl her thumb and forefinger around his upper arm and slowly pressed through his de-muscled arm all the way to the bone.

“Ow! You’re hurting me!”

“Awwww, did I? Sorry babes! I didn't realize I was squeezing so hard.” She eased up and instead played with his muscle by gently pushing it around with her forefinger and making it jiggle. “It’s such a cute little thing! So soft, so sweet and harmless!"

“Liz! Cut it out!”

“But I’m just starting to have fun! Is the big, strong man going to stop me? Wanna try? Ha ha! I think we should compare muscles! Come on, flex that little kitten for me! Show me what it can do! Make it roar like a tiger!”

Barry gritted his teeth, made a fist and flexed as hard as he could, producing a slight bump in his upper arm.

“Meow!” Liz said. “Meeeeoow!”

“Come on, Liz!”

“Aww, I know it’s hard, baby! I mean, it’s hard for you, but IT’S not hard, is it, baby? Not hard at all. Especially not compared to this!” She cocked her arm and began to flex her biceps, this time for real. Barry’s eyes fixed on her upper arm as the large muscle tightened into a large ball and then rose higher and higher, forming a split peak with a second, narrower bulge on top. He touched it and was amazed at its solidity and even more amazed that he was not only unable to hold it with his hand, but that his hand could not even cover the whole side of her upper arm, from the base of her triceps to the top of her biceps peak. Seeing her rock-hard muscle rise even higher than the length of his hand made Barry tremble. How could Liz have muscles THAT big?

“Your little muscle says ’meow’ and my hulking, powerful monster muscle says ’RRROAARRR’!” she teased.

“But that’s not fair. Some of that muscle is mine!” Barry complained, staring at the massive mounds on her upper arms.

“Well, if they’re yours, then take ’em back!” Liz played with her biceps, pumping them up and then letting them subside before pumping them up again. “I’m waiting. They’re right here waiting. Go ahead.” She pumped it up right in front of his lips, knowing that he wanted nothing more than to kiss it. “Oh, what’s the matter? You can’t?”

“You know I can’t!” Barry said looking at Liz’s biceps longingly.

“Well, good! They look so much better on me anyway.”

She let him slide to the floor and he staggered away with a painful hard-on.
113311221.title: First power, then pizza

1133112211.content:
"All right! All this flexing is making me hungry. I'm ready for some PIZZA! You grab the pies, I'll get the beer."

Barry took the pizza boxes to their small table, moving more slowly and awkwardly than usual, finding the boxes unwieldy and oddly tiring to carry.

"Need a hand, baby? Or maybe a little muscle?" Liz teased, flexing her biceps as she walked alongside Barry and pumping them right in front of his face as he dropped the boxes on the table. “Oh, I forgot. You already have a LITTLE muscle, don’t you?”

"Liz!”

“You know you love it!” She slowly flexed one more time, thrilling to the way Barry’s eyes were irresistibly drawn to the way her muscle rose higher and higher above the plane of her arm. She barely resisted the temptation to use the ring to make all her muscles explode in size right there and then. No, it would be better to wait just a teeny bit more. As it was, she could feel how torn Barry was, wanting to bend over her muscle and kiss it, to pit his now pitiful strength against hers ... and lose, to feel the hardness of her muscle as it expanded and to be unable to contain it. It wouldn't be long now before she completely blew him away ....

She opened the boxes. His was cut into eight pieces with deep gooey cheese and generous slices of pepperoni embedded within, while her smaller pie had four, each piled high with a thick layer of fresh cooked spinach. She grabbed one and a bit of her spinach fell off onto Barry’s pie. “Oh! Sorry, honey.”

He smiled. “That's ok. It won’t kill me. I guess I should do a little healthy eating!” He took the piece with the spinach on it and took a large bite. “Hey! This stuff’s great. Where did you order it from? It’s not our usual.”

“Oh, it’s called ’Ring Pizza’,” she said, moving the rest of her pie next to her and starting in on it. She usually took longer to eat than Barry but tonight she ate quickly. She'd need bigger pies from now on, and she would probably steal most of Barry's tonight, but first she wanted to finish her own.

“You must be hungry from your run,” he said, “or maybe it’s just tastier.”

“Or maybe having big muscles makes me hungrier. You’re not eating as fast as you usually do,” she observed. “Feeling full already, my little man? Maybe we need to order the child’s size for you now.”

“Not at all!” He took his second piece. “I can't believe you've already finished!” Liz shrugged. “What’s that music? Did I leave the TV on? It sounds like a cartoon.”

“Like Popeye,” she suggested.

The music got louder.

“Something’s happening,” Barry said. He felt a rumble in his stomach. There was a slight swelling in his gut, which moved up to his chest, then to his shoulders and down his arms. He raised his hands and pulled his sleeves back and there were slight curves in his upper arms, which became larger when he flexed. Sounds of pop guns went off as he tensed each bicep.

“Did you see that? Did you hear that?” Barry said excitedly. "My muscles grew back!"

Liz nodded. “I sure did. That’s amazing. Looks like you got almost half your muscle back.”

“What a night! First this magic stone shrinks me and gives you half my muscle!”

“Or more.”

“And now I get half of it back from eating this pizza!”

“Or from the little piece of spinach that dropped onto it,” she suggested.

“Yeah! Ha ha. The little piece of ...” He looked at Liz’s empty box. “... of spinach. The spinach from your pie, which you already finished.” She nodded. “All of it. A whole pie with piles of --”

“-- spinach. Yeah, I guess I did.” She held up the box. There was nothing in it but a couple of oil stains.

11331122111.content:
Liz looked into Barry’s eyes, a faint smile on her lips.

“What?” he said.

“Oh, nothing.” She stood up.

There was a faint sound of music. Her smile grew slightly larger, the music grew slightly louder.

Barry swallowed. “You think maybe the spinach will make your muscles grow too? Like mine?”

The music burst into full song, and moments later there was a deep rumbling. “Like yours?! Like YOUR little muscles? I don't THINK so!” Liz stood up and thrust out her already muscular arms and full chest, and, with the sounding of cannon-like booms on the first two notes of Popeye’s theme, her large muscles became enormous muscles that burst through the sleeves of her t-shirt and tore her running shorts into flaps that modestly covered her crotch and butt. Her shorts were now held together only by the elastic waistband that was contracting along with her waistline, now latticed with six-pack abs. On each biceps was an image of a windmill, its blades turning rapidly in the wind.

“Liz! You’re huge!!”

“But it’s not finished,” she said as the theme continued with the addition of trombones and french horns. Two louder booms sounded, and all of Liz’s muscles grew again, the bare skin of each of her biceps now showing a image of a roaring waterfall powering a power-generating turbine. She flexed her biceps and as the waterfall stretched higher and wider, the wheel turned faster and faster. Sparks flew around the turbine.

“Liz! That’s too much power!” Barry cried. “You’re going to explode!”

Liz shook her head. “Oh no I won’t! And there’s more coming. I can feel it!”

A full orchestra was now playing Popeye’s theme and two new thundering booms shook the apartment. This time her muscles grew only slightly, at first, her frame not large enough to support more muscle mass. Instead, her legs, arms and torso expanded, pushing her height to 6’4", her chest to 48” (without counting her breasts) and her shoulders to the width of an NFL fullback, although her waist tightened even further. Then the muscle piled on, larger now unflexed than she had been able to flex them before. The image on her biceps now seemed at first to make her skin transparent, showing the anatomical chart view of musculature. But that image quickly changed to stone, then steel, the titanium, and then something small and dark, a neutron star. With each flex it burst into blinding light, showing the hidden power within.

“Mmmmmm, Barry, you have no idea what I'm feeling,” Liz purred. “Such power, and all from a little ring.”

“You mean, a little Ring Pizza, right?” Barry said, looking quizzically at Liz’s super-muscular form and noticing for the first time the dingy ring on her right hand.

“Oh, yes! Ring Pizza. And the stone!” she said, quickly correcting herself, involuntarily closing her right hand to hide most of the ring.

Meanwhile, the orchestration of Popeye’s theme was changing again, the deep sounds of an organ joining the orchestra. The apartment shook violently with more two booms. Liz grew another 4”, as did her chest. She caressed the biceps of her right arm, covering the skin with her hand and then slowly revealing it. The neutron star was now a blinding supernova. She flexed her muscle and --
11331122111.title: Now Liz gets spinach power

Superman gets some help
113311221111.content:
“Stop right there!” a deep, authoritative voice commanded. Superman had smashed through the door and entered the room. Tall and muscular as he was, Liz was half a foot taller and her muscles far more developed. Still, he was super.

"Superman!" Barry exclaimed, amazed that the world's mightiest superhero had come to his house.

"That's right." Superman stood confidently in his power stance, his hands resting on his hips. He looked directly at Liz with his clear blue eyes. “Young woman, that stone does not belong to you. It was sent here by from the dominant females of Dimension 38-DD to disrupt this universe's natural order and must be returned there at once. You are playing with powers that are far too great for any human to handle. You must surrender that stone to me, immediately, before you threaten the very fabric of life in this universe.”

"38-DD?" Liz said, twisting her upper body from side to side. "Why that doesn't seem nearly large enough! Are you sure it’s not from Dimension 52-GG?"

“Do not jest! I don't wish to use force to take it from you, but if you fail to comply I will use whatever means are required.”

“Liz! You aren't thinking of challenging Superman!” Barry said, unsure whether he was supposed to defend his girlfriend against a hero billions of times more powerful than he, convince her to surrender or hide under the table.

“Watch and learn, my little one!” she replied and kissed the air at Barry. She drew herself to her full height and and held her mighty arms in front of her hips, fists lightly clenched, her muscles partly flexed and her chest tight, maximising the uplift of her breasts. Like any man, Superman could not stop himself from looking at them. “And What would you do with my stone?”

“I will take it to Justice League Headquarters and use an inter-dimensional transporter to return it to its proper place.”

Liz picked up the stone and the cloth coaster, touching only the coaster. “Well, it’s been good to me, but you’re Superman. I guess you know better.”

“Of course I do,” he said, relaxing slightly. Although supremely assured of prevailing, he was always pleased to avoid a physical battle with a female, especially one as sexy as this one.

Liz took a deep breath, and Superman’s eyes closely followed the movements of her chest. “Then I suppose I have to give it to you.” She walked forward. “Hold out your hand.” Superman complied, distracted by Liz’s height and her figure. Liz took it and remarked, “Oooh! So warm, even though I’m sure you’ve been flying out in the cold air!”

“Yes ... my superpowered resistance to harm maintains my body temperature at a, Er, constant, um, 100.3 degrees, regardless of --

Liz held his hand vertically barely an inch from her chest, which was less than a deep breath away.

-- “the ambient, um, what are you ... I am ... err, Lois wouldn't like it if I ” --

“Did this?” Liz asked, pulling his palm to her firm breast. His fingers involuntarily contracted to feel her vast bosom. “I’m not all muscle, am I Superman?” she purred and she placed the stone on the outside of his hand.

He shook his head while he continued to hold her breast. “No, you’re very sexy and ... but I ... really must ... take the stone back to ...." He was perspiring. “Funny I ... don’t normally sweat like ....”

“... like a schoolboy touching a large, warm breast for the very first time? But this isn't a normal day,” she replied. "It's a very special day! For both of us!"

“It ... huh?” His body was rapidly becoming thinner and his costume looser and looser, except in the crotch, although unlike Barry and the pizzaman he did not get any shorter. "Great Scott!” he exclaimed. “You've tricked me!” He tried to pull his hand away, but his super-strength was so diminished that Liz easily kept his hand trapped between her breasts and the stone. The stone glowed a deeper and deeper blue until its intense color shone right through the cloth and bathed the room in an eerie light. Meanwhile, except as tinted by the light the color was bleaching from his costume, giving it the appearance of a t-shirt and long underwear.

"I think it's all over between you and me,” Liz said, put the stone back on the table and pushed the formerly super man away from her with two fingers. He tumbled across the room and his shoulder slammed hard against the wall. “Oww! My strength and invulnerability are all gone!” He leapt and tried to fly away, but simply fell to the floor. “Gasp! And so are the rest of my powers!”

“The stone absorbed them all!” Barry said in amazement. “Liz, if you hold the stone now, without shielding yourself with that coaster, then ...”

“... then you’ll have a Super Girlfriend.”

“No!” Superman cried. “You mustn't. Once my powers leave the stone the transfer will be irreversible!”

“Sounds good to me!” Liz said.

“Noo!” Superman cried and dashed across the room at Liz to stop her, diving into her midsection to knock her down and keep her from the stone. She didn't bother to move, letting him crash against her solid abs and then slide down to her feet, failing to budge her even an inch.

“As I was saying ...” she joked and held up the stone in the palm of her hand. Immediately she was bathed in a blue aura, while streaks of yellow and red burst from the stone and swirled around her. Her t-shirt darkened to a deep blue hue with Superman’s S emblem, which slowly morphed to SL and then SDL. Her shorts turned bright red. As the aura around her faded the stone, a glistening glowing pink, rose into the air, slipped into an inter-dimensional wormhole and disappeared with a “POP!”

Liz held out her massively muscular arms and looked at her hands and then down at Superman, lying disconsolately at her feet. "Awww, if you'd waited a little longer it just might have gone home all by itself," she said to Superman. "Instead, you had to be be bossy and unpleasant, and now you've lost ALL your powers! And what about me?" She smiled sweetly and then elevated four inches into the air rolling Superman off her. She floated over to Barry and landed next to him.

“Flying power, check!” she said.

She glanced at the pizza boxes and incinerated them with a blast of heat vision. “Heat vision, check!”

With a gust of wind she disappeared from the room for a moment and returned with the Hope Diamond, the Star of India sapphire, and Michelle Obama’s full collection of sport bras. “Super speed, check! With a bit of super mischief!”

“And now, sweetie, I'm gonna do a trick." She picked up the fireplace poker and casually twisted it between her fingers as if it were taffy and braided it into two interlocking rings. "Ok, see if you can break them or pull them apart.”

"You've got to be kidding." Barry took them and strained against the rings, which remained exactly as they were. He shook his head and handed them back to Liz. She grinned and slid the rings up her arm, then casually flexed her biceps and produced a soccer ball sized mound of super muscle that burst through the metal. She looked down at Barry’s crotch. “Ooh, nice one, honey! Don't worry, we’ll play with that thing of yours a little later. But for now, super strength, check, and, ha-ha, X-ray vision, check!”

She turned her attention to Superman, pursed her lips and blew, lifting him into the air, forcing him across the room and pinning him against the wall. The wind forced his shirt up, revealing an unmuscled belly, frost appeared on the wall around him and then goosebumps appeared. He shivered. She focused the stream of air more tightly and styled his hair into a part down the middle. “Yeah! All kinds of super breath, check!”

"You've got exactly the same powers as Superman!" Barry said, standing even more awkwardly.

"Actually ... no," Liz said, smiling. "I've got more! Don't you remember after the first time I held the stone, when you shrunk and I grew? Remember when you felt my muscles?"

"Um, yeah," Barry said, thrusting his hands into his front pants pockets to create more space for himself.

"Did they seem the same size as yours were, or larger?"

"Gulp! Larger, definitely."

"And after I got the pizzaman's muscles, were mine the same size as his, or larger?"

"Um, much larger."

"And after I ate the spinach, did I get the same benefit as Popeye, or more?"

"I don't know. More?"

"Much more! Did you ever see a picture of a blinding supernova on Popeye's biceps? I know you've seen every cartoon."

Barry shook his head.

"So, would you think that after getting the spinach, the pizzaman's muscles and, chuckle, yours, I'd end up as powerful as Superman or more so?"

"I guess ... so, you mean, Liz, you're stronger than Superman was?" Barry asked trying with all his willpower to control himself.

"Barry, that stone didn't just transfer power, it amplified it. I had a massive base of muscle and strength BEFORE I got Superman's powers. Even without that, the stone would have made me more powerful than he was. But his powers were applied to my enhanced strength, not to the strength of an ordinary human. And besides, that stone didn't only give me more power than him, it gave me more POWERS. I'm not 'Super', I'm 'Super Duper'! Super Duper Liz!" she proclaimed, puffing out her massive chest and proudly displaying the SDL emblem between her breasts.

"Oh ... god!" Barry exclaimed and covered the sticky crotch of his pants with his hands, embarrassed.

"Don't worry, honey. I'm sure there's plenty more of that coming!" Liz said brightly.
113311221111.title: A Superhero arrives

choices: Superman's Fortress of Solitude
Teen Titan Headquarters
1133112211111.content:
Superman sat on the ground with his back against the wall, having slid down to the floor after Liz finished humiliating with her super breath. He was bruised, chilled and more sore than he had ever felt, having been reduced to a pathetic vestige of his former self. He had no choice but to call for help on his Justice League transmitter with a thought. He was unsure if anyone heard him until a quick rumble was followed by a crash through the wall opposite the door Superman had destroyed, which unfortunately for Superman was only a few feet from where he sat. He ducked as the debris hit him, but luckily wasn’t damaged any further.

Liz and Barry turned to see the smallish but fit figure of Wonder Girl standing there with her hands on her slight hips. She had a red crop top with the WW symbol on her chest and short sleeves just covering her shoulders. Her firm stomach was bare and she had on tight red pants and dark red boots. Her long blonde hair danced in the breeze. She gave Superman a quick glance and then looked up at the large woman in front of her.

“Alright, that’s enough from you. I suggest you stop this foolishness before someone gets hurt.”

This was the draft in which she footnoted each fact or opinion, having already completed the outline and principal arguments (first draft), detailed arguments, introduction and conclusions (second draft), leaving the fourth draft for word choice and sentence flow. She knew other people, especially her brother, considered her commitment to her work to be overkill, but she could not see the point of doing anything without putting all of her capabilities into it, whether it was a history paper, a debating society competition, teaching her Sunday school class, soccer (in the fall) and tennis (in the spring, shopping, cooking, or her Facebook page. She tried not to be overly judgmental, but she simply could not understand living any other way. Doing half a job seemed to her to be a complete waste of the time it took for the half to be done. Just as wasting half of the family's college tuition money on Mark meant that she, the more talented and harder working of the siblings, could not afford to attend Yale, and instead had to join Mark next year at Local State University Branch.

Thinking about the poor decisions her parents often made (even though she did try always to "honor" them) left her feeling too restless to work, so she hit the timer for her 15 minute break and lay down on the floor to do the day's crunches and push ups. She was up to 125 crunches and 50 push-ups (full push-ups, not the easier variant for girls), and she did each one slowly to get the full effect. Halfway through her routine she heard an odd ping on her desk, but she resisted the temptation to investigate. Whatever it was would wait until she finished.

Finally, when she completed her 50th push-up (note to increase next time to 53), she returned to her desk. Her lamp was still burning, so it wasn't the filament. There were no new email or text messages -- it wasn't her sound, but someone could have changed it, or the phone could have malfunctioned. She was going to check the supports for her bookshelves when she noticed something shiny on her desk, a ring. It was cheap-looking, slightly bent. It must have come through the window, but how? Why would someone throw it at her? She didn't have any secret admirers, she was sure, but also wasn't unpopular enough for people to throw things at her. It piqued her curiosity, but apart from leaning out the window quickly and inspecting the street for possible suspects, there was little she could do immediately. Instead she looked at the ring more carefully. There was nothing special about its appearance. Its color was somewhere between brass and gold, which meant it wasn't valuable, and it wasn't terribly pretty either. She would have cleaned it to inspect it more closely, but she didn't have time for another interruption for two hours. Instead she slipped it on her pinkie, rather than her ring finger, just to remind herself to investigate it later rather than to adopt as her jewellery. What she wanted now was to finish her fourth draft without interruption.

Twenty five minutes later her draft was done. She had not even noticed time passing. Had she daydreamed the whole time? No, her footnotes were even more complete than usual, each one in the correct style, and when she thought about it she recalled each footnote she had added. But she had worked with complete concentration, without having a single distracting thought or even hearing anything going on around her. That was a little frightening.

"Wasn't that what you wanted?" she heard a voice inside ask.

"Not really," she replied, used to having dialogues with herself. "It could have been dangerous. What if there had been a fire? What if my mother had come in?"

"You said you wanted to work without interruption, so there would have been no interruptions."

"That's illogical thinking. Just because I didn't want interruptions doesn't mean there wouldn't be any!"

"That's exactly what it means. Whatever you want will be, so long as you wear me."

Wendy gripped her desk. "You? Who are you? I'm talking to myself?"

"No. You're talking to your ring."

She looked down at the ring. It looked normal, non-descript. She pulled it off. OK, she thought. The voice didn't answer, and she felt different, less focused. She looked at the ring. It sat on her desk, immobile. She picked it up gingerly, holding it around the edges. Nothing. She cautiously slipped it back on her pinkie.

Well?

"I bond with my wearer, but only while I'm worn."

"Oh, so you're a 'wearer instrument'," Wendy punned, using a concept she learned from an investment book she bought, hoping to make money for Yale.

"Exactly."

"And what else do you do, aside from talking in my head and helping me concentrate on my homework?"

"I make whatever you want happen."

Wendy said nothing. She stared at the ring. "That's ... like being God."

"I do not create a state of being. Through me, the wearer exercises a power."

"A godlike power!" The ring was silent. "Don't you think so?"

"I don't think. I am just a ring."

"Well, I think so." The ring was silent. "So, you could give me enough money to go to Yale?"

"Yes."

"Easily?"

"That term has no meaning for me."

"What? It makes no difference whether you put a new penny on my desk or ... or create an entire alternative universe?"

"It makes no difference at all."

"You could transport me across the universe?"

"Anywhere in the universe."

"You could create two identical copies of me?"

"Yes, but only you would wear the ring. I cannot affect my own properties and thus cannot duplicate myself for the copies to wear."

"If you give the wearer so much power, how is it possible that no one knows about you? That you haven't fundamentally altered the universe already?"

"Why do you think no one knows about me? And how do you know that I haven't?"

Wendy's mouth dropped open. She shuddered. "You are ... you make ... this is too much power!" She started to remove it and then stopped. "But if I am not wearing it, someone else will, right?"

"Yes."

"So, before I was wearing it, someone else was."

"Yes."

"Who?"

"Mark, your brother."

"Mark!!?? HE had all that POWER??!! He could have helped with getting me the money for ... what did he do with it?"

"He made a stop sign and then a statue of his girlfriend out of a tree, enhanced his running ability and then made himself ten times as powerful as Superman."

"And why isn't he wearing the ring now?"

"He didn't want me to be damaged. Not that I could be."

"10 times as powerful as Superman? Ha! Typical. He has no imagination and never thinks things through. Then you should make me 10 trillion times as powerful as Superman. Um, does that mean anything? Does he even exist?"

"He does now."

"OK, then make me 10 trillion times as powerful as Superman is right now, at 4:30 pm Eastern Daylight Time on August 30, 2011. In case he ever stops existing."

"Well reasoned."

Wendy was momentarily struck dumb. Her senses had expanded beyond any conception, but so had her mind's ability to process the information streaming in to her from all corners of the universe. Her energy and strength seemed infinite, although she knew it wasn't. She stood still, experiencing the full extent of the power she had just gained and then she smiled.

"What do YOU get out of this?"

"I simply do what my wearer wishes."

"And the more powerful the wearer, the more extreme the wishes .... Yes, you are a mischievous ring, aren't you? Or was the mischief in your maker?"

"I am just a ring."

"You or someone or something is enjoying this. It isn't pure chance that the ring has come to me. Someone or something can't wait to see what I do to Mark."

"I am just a ring."

"Ha ha ha. Sure. And I am just a sixteen year old girl, with an older brother who wouldn't even lift a finger to help me!"

"Yes?"

"And you are just a ring."
13.title: Flew across town to Mark's home, onto Wendy...

choices: Me
Pam
Supergirl
133.content:
Wendy licked her lips and a million different sensations crossed her tongue. She could taste, feel and smell seemingly everything around her for miles and associate each sensation to its origin. It was nearly overwhelming. She sighed and even that subtle projection blew her papers around her room and knocked over her lamp. Realizing that perhaps she was a bit too powerful for the fragile universe she was in, she immediately thought to ring.

“OK, let’s knock down my power a bit for the moment before I destroy everything around me. Give me twice the power Mark has at this moment in time and allow me to control it well enough to interface with others and my environment as I would normally so as not to give my abilities away.”

The ring immediately responded. “Done.”

Wendy stood up and let out another controlled breath. Nothing unusual happened. Satisfied that she could at least control herself, she decided to focus on Mark. Using her enhanced vision she saw Mark had punched Superman down toward the ground and he had created a quarter mile trench and was lying at the end barely conscious. Mark was floating down to the ground near Superman with a satisfied smirk on his face. Wendy grunted.

“Mark is apparently enjoying his new powers and ability to kick Superman’s behind. I could fly over there and do the same to him. Or perhaps I could have someone else do it instead. It would be fun to see him frustrated by not getting what he desires, or even the opposite. Hmmm. That would have to be tailored a bit. If he wanted to breath and couldn’t, he’d be dead quite quickly. Perhaps it could be focused on someone he knows.”

The ring sounded in her head. “Was there something you wanted from those thoughts?”

“Perhaps. If Mark is going to suffer, I want it to be more than just a quick loss of his powers. Or maybe that would work too. Just give me a moment.”

The ring went silent as Wendy went back to her thoughts. She passed on her desire to go her computer and outline the different options and weigh each one. However she was never one to make a rash decision.

“So if there is a Superman, is there a Supergirl?”

“No. Mark only thought about Superman.”

“So there could be a Supergirl if I wanted one?”

“Of course.”

Wendy rubbed her chin. “Or perhaps Wonder Woman. Interesting.”

Tossing several options around, Wendy decided on a course of action.

“OK ring. I would like to add something else to the mix. Give this person powers and abilities at about Superman’s level, but have those powers slowly increase to continue to frustrate Mark since this person will be trying to protect Superman. This person will slowly increase their muscle mass too, since I know Mark doesn’t care for fit girls that might compete with him, much less overwhelm him.”

The ring chimed in. “Very well. Further direction will be needed once a person is chosen.”

Wendy smiled. “Of course.”

“I believe it would be interesting to see this person come in to try and help Superman. I’m sure Mark would only delight further in defeating or controlling both of them. But his delight would be short lived of course.”

“So to finish the scene, have this person fly in and engage Mark before Mark gets to Superman. Have this person’s powers increase continually so that after a few minutes this person is as powerful as Mark. Then have the person continue to grow more powerful until she is twenty times as powerful as Mark. Have her muscles slowly increase in size and definition as her power increases.”

The ring latched on to a few other thoughts and as soon as Wendy finished, the ring echoed in her head. “So who shall it be?”

Wendy focused her super vision for a moment to catch up.


Mark neared Superman, smiling broadly. “Give it up Superman; you are clearly no match for me.”

Superman struggled to his feet, looking with frustration and anger at this young man in jeans, athletic shoes, a tight t-shirt and a sports jacket. He was athletic looking, but not as powerful looking as he was. But he was clearly strong. And faster. It was if he had all of his powers but enhanced further. Defeating him would be difficult. He needed a moment to at least clear his head.

“What do you want?”

Mark paused for a moment. He really hadn’t considered much more than kicking Superman’s butt.

“I’ll figure that out once I finish kicking your ass!”

Superman readied himself. He had defeated great foes before, but he didn’t know anything about this young man and that, as Batman would attest, is a bad tactical disadvantage. His best hope for the moment would be to look for a distraction and perhaps escape. He didn’t realize that the distraction would be there sooner than he thought.

Wendy smiled. “I know just the person. Send…”
133.title: Wendy decides how to frustrate Mark

choices: Supergirl continues to break Mark
Supergirl crushes Mark and Superman
Wendy gives Supergirl even more power
1333.content:
As Mark moved closer to Superman his with his arm back and his fist raised, a flash of blue zoomed across his head.

The force of the blow barely affected Mark, but he stopped his advancement. Mark and Superman both turned to see who or what had interceded. Twenty feet away stood Supergirl, her cape and hair still flittering against the vortex she had created. She was also shaking her fist as the punch to Mark’s chin had caused her more pain than it had him.

“Leave my cousin alone!”

Mark smirked. Supergirl? This was even better. He could defeat both of them now and cause Superman even more distress. Superman was not as receptive.

“Supergirl. Not now. You need to get away.”

Supergirl grunted. Typical. He clearly needs help, but doesn’t want it from a “girl”. Even if it is from the most powerful girl in the universe. Well to hell with him.

“I’m not going anywhere!”

Her healing factor was working even faster than she remembered. Her injured hand was already recovered and she felt…. Stronger? It must just be the adrenaline.

Mark looked over at Supergirl with a bit of lust and then shot Superman a jab to his nose that jerked his head back and caused blood to flow. Superman grunted and fell back on his behind, dazed and nearly out. Supergirl grit her teeth as Mark chuckled.

“Super GIRL huh? I’m kicking Super MAN’s ass and you think you can do something about it?”

Supergirl let out a determined breath and moved forward quickly again, this time unleashing a punch to Mark’s stomach. Mark saw it coming and made no move to get out of the way. This time a definitive ‘CRACK’ was heard as his abs were currently stronger than she could handle. Supergirl yelped in pain and stumbled back. Mark reached his arm out and gave Supergirl a shove, sending her tumbling away. He laughed mockingly.

“Ha! That was funny. You really think you can take me little girl?”

Supergirl sat up quickly, shooting daggers toward Mark. The fact that her broken wrist had already healed and that she already felt even stronger was placed in the back of her head for the moment. Her eyes turned red and she let loose her heat vision. Mark narrowed his eyes from the brightness, but once again chose not to get out of the way. Her heat vision burned hot though and even his advanced clothing started to singe and smolder. After 10 seconds, Supergirl’s eyes dried a bit and she blinked to clear her vision. Mark sniffed and pulled his charred jacket off and tossed it to the ground. He padded out the small fires on his pants.

“Pathetic. You’ll pay for ruining my jacket. Now let me show you how it’s done.”

Mark’s eyes turned red and his 10 time Superman enhanced heat vision blasted right at Supergirl. She turned her head and screamed as the intense heat washed over her. He focused on her boots and they were soon ablaze. Supergirl turned on her back and kicked them off. He moved toward her skirt and that too was soon on fire and she painfully reached down to rip that off too. He moved the heat vision up toward the S on her chest. Her top started smoldering, but she turned around and her cape started on fire instead. Mark grunted, disappointed that she had turned away, and stopped his heat vision. Supergirl tossed off the cape and to his amazement stood back up to face him. Something was off.

Supergirl for her part was amazed that she had not only survived, but recovered nearly immediately. But it was more than that, she felt a continuous surge of power course through her body as she patted out the last of the fire on her top, ignoring the holes he had created. And for the first time they both discovered that her body was transforming. The girlish figure was changing. Her completely bare legs were now gymnastic fit, if not more, with sexy curves, but substantial muscle. Her tight abs sported a solid, nicely separated six pack. Those narrow abs curved outward toward an impressively wide and muscular back, while her chest pushed forward with a muscular set of pecs. Supergirl’s arms showcased bulges and curves never seen before on her slight figure. And her entire body appeared to be pulsing with continued muscle growth as she felt her strength apparently increasing. She wasn’t sure what was going on, but her confidence, moments ago nearly shattered, was growing as well.

“Is that the best you’ve got? Think it’s funny trying to strip off my clothes you pervert?”

Mark grunted. He did. He could look through her top if he wanted, but wanted to embarrass her. Superman was struggling to recover, but was still seeing stars. Supergirl shot him a glance, but felt it was for the best to keep this young man focused on her seeing as she seemed to be growing in more ways than one. Mark was a bit frustrated, but not worried. He was chalking it up as an adrenaline rush and decided to give her a real taste of his power.

As Mark moved forward quickly, Supergirl’s eyes widened as she struggled to keep up and barely had a chance to flex her abs as Mark shot a hard punch to her midsection. She doubled over with a loud WOOF and he connected to the side of her head with another hard punch that knocked her to the side. But somehow she didn’t go down. In fact she barely stumbled away. The pain in her abs and ringing in her head stopped almost immediately. Gritting her teeth she stood back up to face him again.

“What’s the matter? Holding back because I’m a girl?”

Mark stopped and blinked for a moment. He WASN’T. She should have been knocked out, or at least knocked to the ground. He hadn’t hit Superman that hard and he was still barely awake. What was going on?

Supergirl stood by to pool her strength as Mark hesitated for a moment. Her muscles continued to expand across her slender frame and were now on par with a competitive female bodybuilder. Those once non-descript legs now sported bulging cow heart shaped calves and a defined set of quads that pushed out with incredible thickness and definition. Her abs were now easily an 8 pack and pulsed with increasing strength and hardness. Supergirl’s top was stretching audibly around her surging torso as her lats spread wider and her pecs continued to push forward, showcasing multiplying striations. With her fists now on her narrow hips, Supergirl’s shoulders broadened and pushed upward, her biceps bulged up toward the size of softballs, pushing her sleeve upward and her triceps pushed out three inches thick, detailed and defined. She never looked more intimidating and she never felt more powerful.

Mark was confused further, but didn’t want to wait to see where this was headed. He lunged forward to punch her in the nose, but to his amazement, Supergirl stepped back and knocked his arm away to the side, nearly falling down in the process. As Mark righted himself, Supergirl quickly did the same. He followed with another hard punch, but he was shocked to his core when Supergirl reached out and caught his punch with a thunderous crack as all of Mark’s power was blunted. The resulting shock wave blew dust and debris for hundreds of feet. Mark grunted, and when he tried to pull his arm back, he found he couldn’t!

Supergirl now grinned knowingly as her muscles continued to pulse and her strength continued to ramp upward. She then began to squeeze down on Mark’s fist and his bones started to crack under her unyielding pressure. He yelped and reached out with his other hand to pry his damaged fist away. Supergirl’s eyes lit up with delight. Whatever was happening to her wasn’t done yet. She was continuing to grow ever stronger. He jerked her arm forward a few inches, but now, even with both of his arms against her one, she was holding firm.

“Who’s the little girl now?”

She squeezed down harder and felt more satisfying crunches as she broke more bones in his hand. Mark fell to his knee and looked at the ground in pain. Supergirl smiled evilly and released her grip. Mark let out a relieved breath and looked up at the once overmatched teenage girl. Her smile was telling. It was the smile that his sister would give him when she knew she were right about something or had beaten him at a game. Supergirl pulled up her right arm and looked over toward it with a satisfying smirk.

“You think you can deal with THIS little man?”

She tensed her fist and her arm nearly exploded with muscle, tearing the sleeve up to her bulging shoulder as her tricep dipped low with the size of half a volleyball and her bicep blasted up into a mountain of muscle the size of a FULL volleyball! And as she held her flex, the bicep split widened and her back bicep pushed up a peak that quickly reached the top of her fist! One hundred times the strength and power of Superman now flowed through her veins and pounded in her hyper developed muscles. She was ten times as strong as Mark and growing more powerful by the moment.

Wendy was enjoying every minute of what she was seeing. To see Supergirl large and in charge was turning her on to no end. It was delightful to see the tables turned on Mark.

The next event caused Wendy to smile as…
1333.title: Supergirl

choices: At the fortress Supergirl takes charge
Wendy decides to join them
13331.content:
Mark looked up wide eyed with horror. He nearly peed his pants at the site of the once slight girl showcasing so much muscle and having such overwhelming super strength. He shook his broken hand and the advanced healing worked quickly. As Supergirl stared back down at him, Mark stood up, looking to get away from the mega powered Supergirl. But Supergirl was hardly done. She released her flex and shot a jab into his stomach. Mark let out a horrible grunt and he fell forward as Supergirl had dug her fist deep into his gut, ripping his muscles and tearing into vital organs. She then easily pulled her mighty arm upward until Mark dangled in the air, draped helplessly across her mega muscled limb. She looked into his pained face with satisfaction.

“Did that hurt? Did I nearly break your manly spine? Well too bad. I’m the super duper strong one now. I’m the girl with all the muscle and all the power. And you’re about see just what one little girl is capable of.”

Supergirl balled her other small hand into a fist, looking to punch this guy out to the moon. She flexed up her other arm into a gigantic bulging mountain of muscle that bristled with muscle fibers and throbbed with power. Her bicep was the size of bowling ball and was strong enough to punch an entire mountain range to dust! Pulsing her bicep up and down a few times, the peak jumped three inches up and down, then four inches, then five! Her bicep was still growing, still becoming stronger, still surging with ever increasing power! Mark’s jaw dropped open and tears started flowing down his face. Supergirl’s bicep would cause the Hulk to pause!

“Say goodbye loser!”

Just as she was about to unleash a punch against Mark that would quite possibly send him out of the universe, Superman spoke out.

“That’s quite enough young girl.”

Supergirl dropped her arm and let Mark fall to the ground in front of her with a thud. Mark gasped for breath, clutching his injured stomach. Supergirl turned to face Superman who was walking slowly toward her. She clenched her fists at her side and her muscles all crackled as she flexed down angrily. Her legs were now filled with more muscle than the biggest heavyweight male bodybuilder to ever live. Standing on her bare toes, those small feet curved up into soccer ball sized calves and up to wide hamstrings and pulsing, mega powered thighs separated dangerously into vicious quads so thick that they touched each other in the middle, nearly covered her narrow knees and bulled forward a foot thick. Her red panties were nothing but a thong against her muscular glutes. Her abs bristled into a ten pack of tectonic plates deeply separated and fighting for room on her narrow waist. Uncountable pebble obliques roared up her side into a four foot wide set of lats and a chest that was stretching the S on her top to ridiculous proportions as her pecs pushed out twin cubes of she-muscle. Supergirl bobbed her uber powered, nine inch thick pecs up and down, pushing her breasts outward to the point of ripping the top to shreds. Due to her continued flexing, her arms were packed with more muscle than Superman had ever seen on anyone, easily outdistancing the muscle on the rest of her body. Supergirl held her arms away from her body and tensed and un-tensed her bowling ball biceps in a dangerous display of size, power and strength, pushing them to near watermelon sized mountains of girl muscle! Supergirl spat at Superman.

“Really? Are you not paying attention old man? This kid was kicking your ass and I was about to finish him off. You should be thanking me.”

Superman paused. He wasn’t used to Supergirl talking back to him. Of course he wasn’t used to Supergirl looking like that either. Superman held his frown as Mark rolled onto his back as he struggled to recover.

Wendy was nearly ready to get Mark out of there lest Supergirl really did kill him. Now it appeared that Supergirl was going to take her frustration out on Superman too. Wendy sat back and chuckled.

Superman was in no shape to take her on, that was for sure. Her muscles to ridiculously swollen and her biceps were otherworldly. He had no way to even estimate her strength level right now, but he feared it was well beyond his. Still. He had to put his foot down.

“I don’t think so. You’ve defeated him. We can take him back to the fortress and question him there.”

Supergirl smirked. What a fine idea. There were incredible devices back at the fortress including graviton bars to truly test her strength. To crush Superman in his own house would be even sweeter. Pretending to go along and bow to Superman’s will, Supergirl nodded her head.

“Sure, why not.

Grabbing Mark by the back of his pants, Supergirl picked up him up and rocketed into the air. Superman let out a breath as he jumped in the air and followed behind. Once he got to the fortress he could find out what had happened to Supergirl and fix it.

Or so he thought.
13331.title: Supergirl continues to break Mark

choices: grew bigger and stronger until she could break out.
took over Supergirl's mind and made her fight Superman.
133312.content:
Wendy was overjoyed. Watching Supergirl go from super to stupendous was one of the most exciting things she'd ever seen. The fact that she had created such a powerful being from nothingness made her feel like a goddess, and what's more is she found herself incredibly turned on by Supergirl's expanded muscles. 

Wendy watched from her room using supervision that was 20 times more powerful than Superman's as Supergirl flew off with a nearly unconscious Mark in one hand. Superman followed looking worried about his super muscled cousin. Wendy then leapt out of her window and floated above her home enjoying the feel of flight. The possibilities of her new powers (not simply her superpowers, but those of the ring) sent a shiver through her body which materialized as goosebumps along her arms and legs.

"Ok ring, I want you to make it so I'm invisible and imperceptible to Superman, Supergirl, and Mark until I decide otherwise."

"Done," the ring's calm voice spoke in her head.

Like a flash Wendy accelerated to chase the trio of supers (founding Mark among them felt strange, but it was true) and quickly caught up to them. She flew next to, in front of, and all around the three of them and they never noticed she was there. Wendy flew close to Supergirl, examining her massive physique with a grin. She lusted for, and would soon have, muscles and strength to eclipse the buff blonde, but all in good time.

They all arrived at Superman's Fortress of Solitude together and entered its crystal caverns. Supergirl carried Mark to a bank of clear walled cells near where she jailed him. Then she hurried to the graviton machines which were located in an expansive alcove that was Superman's makeshift gym. Supergirl gripped the enormous bar that was currently set near Superman's maximum lift and picked it up with a single hand. She curled it several times finding little to no resistance or effort. 

"Computer, current weight?" Supergirl asked holding the graviton bar high in one hand while examining her fingernails on her free hand.

The graviton machine responded in a dispassionate voice, "One hundred million tons."

Supergirl took the bar in both hands and braced herself. "Computer, increase weight to five hundred million tons." Supergirl felt the bar in her hands get heavier, but it was still quite manageable. She curled it to her chest a few times using both hands then tried with just one. She struggled at first, but managed to squeeze out five full repetitions; her arm swelled with a volleyball sized bicep with thick veins snaking across the top.

Supergirl held the thick bar with both hands again and readied herself. "Computer, one billion tons." There was a definite increase again, but again she found she was able to handle the weight with few worries. She held it high above her head and smiled. "Look, cousin, I'm not even close to hitting my max."

Superman's expression was grave. "Kara, put that down and come here."

Supergirl laughed. "Make me." She put the enormous bar down anyway and approached her cousin. "So, you wanna arm wrestle?" She then raised and flexed both of her arms, her massive muscles exploding into 44 inch cannons.

"Kara, this is serious. We need to understand what's happening to you and how this boy became so powerful."

"Who cares about him? He's contained. As for me I think it's obvious what's happened, I've gone from Supergirl to Megagirl. I'm enhanced in every way you can imagine. Watch this!"

Supergirl became a blur as she moved around the fortress with greater speed than even Superman could perceive. Less than a second later she stood before Superman (and the still invisible Wendy) in a brand new costume. This one resembled a skimpy bikini that, unlike her previous costume, showed off her monstrous chest, abs, and shoulders. The bottoms just barely covered her crotch while the back tapered into a thong. The suit was blue except for the piece over her left breast which was red and yellow and made the shape of the crest of the family of El. She has also attached a new red cape which flowed over her huge shoulders.

"I just sewed this together thread by thread. It's not very big, but I'll bet you couldn't even see me moving. And that's just the start. My powers are amped way above yours, my strength is completely out of your league, and there's nothing you can do about it." Supergirl put her hands on her hips and puffed her chest out to obscene size.

Wendy decided she needed to even the odds. She was about to make her presence known, but she didn't want the super, duper powered Supergirl to stop her before she could put her plans into action. And then there was Mark, she was only just getting started with him. Her poor brother was awake and on his feet in his cell watching the kryptonian cousins discuss Kara's new enhanced powers and figure. He seemed just as interested in how she'd grown as Superman was. Well, they were about to find out.

Even though she knew she couldn't be heard she still spoke quietly to the ring. "Ok, ring, I want you to make me 10 times more powerful than Supergirl is right now at this moment in time."

"Done," the ring said and Wendy could feel untold strength pour into her body.

"Now, I want Supergirl, Superman, and Mark to be able to see and hear me again."

Before the ring could announce that it had completed her request both Superman and Supergirl were speeding towards where Wendy stood, attacking the intruder. Wendy could feel time slow as her perception accelerated. She could have easily avoided either of the super beings headed for her, but she instead allowed herself to be caught and thrown into a cell next to Mark.

"Wendy?!?" Mark was even more confused by this new development than he'd been by Supergirl outmuscling him. Then he spotted the ring on her finger and his stomach dropped. "Wait! How did you get-?"

Wendy raised a finger to her lips and Mark fell silent. He'd been worried enough about dealing with the supers, but at least they were, deep down, good guys. Wendy had no such ties and now had access to power far beyond his own imagination.

"Who are you?" Superman demanded. "How did you get in here without our knowing it?"

Wendy ignored his questions and instead examined the walls of her cell. They looked like they were made of slim pieces of plastic but she was sure it was a much stronger material.

"ANSWER ME!" Superman was beginning to lose his cool. Having his cousin gain powers beyond his own was difficult enough, but no one should be able to break into the Fortress of Solitude, no one.

Wendy continued to ignore him. Instead she pulled her arm back and unleashed a titanic punch into the center of the wall that stood between her and her captors. Amazingly, however, the clear wall remained in place unaffected.

Sybill Manning was doing her second long lap around her woods trail. Normally she only did one during her weekday runs, but the ease with which Mark passed her several times made her so angry that she was punishing herself with a double workout. It was punishment time. There would be no reward cupcake today and no pizza tomorrow either!

The more she thought about it the angrier she became. She trained harder than anyone at the university, both on the road and in the gym, and felt rewarded by her dominance of the school track and field records. She had the all time university records for the 3000, 5000 and 10000 meters, along with the javelin and high jump events, and regularly won state and national events. To have some middling male athlete suddenly improve and overtake her made her blood boil.

She loved being a woman. Although she was sexually attracted to men, at least most of the time, she believed -- no, knew – that by comparison men were emotionally shallow, conversationally stunted and libidinally limited. They had so little imagination and style, at least the ones who weren't gay. She loved transforming herself from a red-faced, chest-heaving animal, dripping with sweat, into a lithe, sweet-smelling, feminine woman . She might not have the curviest body; her level of conditioning got in the way of that. But she still had the right bulges in the right places, knew how to dress, how to style or hair and make up her face and, especially, how to move her body, whether walking down the street, shaking on the dance floor or being intimate in bed.

But in athletic performance, being a woman truly sucked. Why were women's trophies smaller? Why were her ceremonies held in a side hall, while the football team's were at mass rallies? The scholarship amounts were the same, thanks to Title IX, but the men's were announced in the sports pages, while hers were in a distant corner of the university web site, if they even remembered to post them. Why? It was obvious -- her times were slower, her throws landed closer, her jumps peaked lower. No matter how much she trained her heart pumped less blood, her legs were shorter, her muscles were smaller and weaker than comparable male athletes. Her performances could be excellent ... for a girl. That was all. And having a middle quality runner like Mark improve enough to pass her just drove the point home.

She pushed harder, not for improvement's sake but to punish herself and her fate, when she was startled by something shiny flying over her shoulder, knocking her off her stride. It landed just five feet in front of her, bounced a few times and then settled on a rock. She stopped to pick it up. It was a ring, a bit dirty and slightly bent. She flicked it back and forth between her thumb and forefinger. It looked cheap and somewhat pale against her tanned skin. Where did it come from? She was about to put it back when she decided to put it on, just for a moment, to see how it looked. An electric feeling coursed through her, restoring all her energy as though she had not already been running an hour. What's this? she wondered.

"This is what you've wanted," the ring said.

"Huh?"

"All you want is yours when you wear me. Think it, and it will be true."

"I must be losing my mind! I'm hearing voices!" she said, panicking. She looked down at the ring and pulled it off. The feeling vanished. She was breathing hard, hot, tired and now cranky too. She slipped it back on.

"Isn't that better?" the ring said.

"Yes." She looked around. "It's wonderful. I could run all day feeling like this."

"Yes, if that's what you want."

Sybil started running again, faster than before. She enjoyed the refreshed feeling the ring gave her, but what she needed for conditioning, both physical and mental, was a tough workout. She forced herself to run harder, to push herself to do more than what her body could comfortably do.

After fifteen minutes her breathing was rough again and she was warm and relaxed. She reached the part of the path that ran by the local high school. It was later in the day than she usually ran, due to her double lap, and the football team was running for their aerobic training. They ran slowly, talking and laughing. Coach didn't care how hard they worked, as long as they didn't get back too early and interrupt his afternoon with the art teacher's sexy, young assistant. They crowded the trail leaving no room for her to pass. "Excuse me, excuse me" she said. The boys laughed louder. A few at the back of the pack spread out to let her go by them, but the ones in front stayed in tight formation. Then the ones in back closed ranks, leaving her trapped amongst them and forced her to slow her pace and cut her stride to avoid running into them.

They talked about her as if she wasn't there.

"Look at those long legs."

"Long and lean!"

"She a student here?"

"Naah, college I think. Or married to one."

"Seen her around before."

"Let me through!" Sybil insisted, holding her hand in front of her and speeding up slightly. She bumped into the runner in front, but he didn't move.

"Hey, are we too slow?"

"Don't you like us?"

"Don't you want to have some fun?"

"Most girls like football players."

"What's wrong with you? Don't you like men?"

"Think you're too good for us?"

"Haha, not with her mini-tits!"

She tried to push through but they closed ranks more tightly.

"Ha! Ha! Look at her pushing Chunky!"

"The whole Mountainview West team couldn't budge him! What's she thinking!"

"She's thinking she wants a piece of Chunky."

"A chunky piece!"

Sybil was getting frightened. The route had curved back into the woods. It was late afternoon and she was alone with over twenty hormonally charged jocks egging each other on. Would they leave her alone and turn back? Her self-defense skills were worth nothing against so many strong boys. Yet again being female was --

"Forgetting something?" the ring said.

She looked down at her ring and then away. "What?"

"You can do anything, remember?"

"Anything? Right, sure I can!" Her heart was pounding.

"Try me."

The pack was slowing down. The boy next to her reached in to touch her. "Hey, guys, maybe they're bigger than they look. Her bra's like a piece of armor."

Another one had his hand on her ass. "Firm and sweet!" he declared.

Chunky looked back and licked his lips.

"I want to be somewhere else. Anywhere!" she thought.

"You have to be more specific."

"I don’t' know! Up in the tree then!"

In the next instant she was one hundred feet higher, sitting on a branch of a tree.

"Good enough?" the ring said.

Sybil saw the boys stopped cold below.

"Where did she go?"

"She couldn’t have just disappeared. People don't do that!"

"I don't get it!"

"She must be hiding. Find her!"

Chunky was feeling his large package. "Yeah, find her!" he thundered.

Sybil's heart was still pounding. "What if they hear me?" she thought.

"What difference would that make? They can't hurt you, that is, unless you want them to," the ring replied.

"Unless I … how could you think that!"

"I'm only a ring. I do what my wearer wants, without judgment. What do you want to do?"

"I want them to suffer!"

"OK. How?"

"I want them to know how they made me feel."

"Easy. But, so what."

Sybil was silent. "You're mischievous, aren't you."

The ring did not reply.

"You're egging me on. You want me to do something nasty to them."

"I'm only a ring. I do what my wearer wants, without judgment. "

"Yeah, right." She looked down at them. The boys' search was flagging, and her butt was getting sore from the branch. "They should feel what I was feeling. Helpless. Scared. Subject to someone else's will, without any control."

"You have to be specific."

"Do I? Ok then. This is what I want!"

“How muscular?”
