As a runner, Sybil worked weights, but concentrated on her core. She sported a nice 6 pack, showcased as much due to her low body fat as to her ab work outs. Her arms were not something she worked all that much unless it was for high reps. And the boys were right about her chest, it was thin and her breasts were very small.

“So you said twice as big? Your right bicep is 8.2 inches around.”

Sybil groaned softly. “That’s all?” She pursed her lips and thought further. “Well twice as big would make my arm over 16 inches. That is pretty big.”

“For a girl.”

Sybil puffed a strand of blonde hair out away from her left eye. “Are you sure that you don’t have your own agenda here?”

The ring went silent. Sybil sighed. “Well let’s pause on that for the moment. How about 10 times as strong. I can bench around 90 pounds. That would mean I could bench nearly half a ton! What is the world record?”

“That would be over 100 pounds below the record for normal men.”

Sybil hummed, ignoring the normal part of the equation and thought for the moment. “OK ring. Give me muscles so that my biceps are 50% bigger than any of those football players and spread that amount of muscle across my body without any increase in body fat. Give me some curves too, so keep my midsection the same circumference and give me some proportionally sized rock hard breasts. Adjust my clothes as I grow to keep me covered. And make me ten times as strong as the strongest man.

“Are your multiplying factors based upon normal human records or super human records?

Sybil scrunched her nose. “What do you mean?”

“Currently the strongest man is Mark Harding.”

Sybil spat. “Who is Mark Harding?”

“The previous person who slipped me on his finger. He is the man that ran passed you so easily with my enhancements. He wished to be 10 times stronger than Superman.”

Sybil’s eyes widened. “So that’s what happened! But Superman? He’s fictional.”

“Not anymore. Mark is roughing up Superman right now.”

Sybil sniffed. “If there’s a Superman, then what about a Supergirl?”

“Mark’s thoughts only included Superman.”

Sybil’s eyes narrowed back down as she looked at the football players below.

“Let’s start with the enhancements I described based on normal human male records so I can teach these stupid jocks a lesson. Then I’ll concentrate on something grander. And that Mark Harding.”

And just like that, Sybil felt a rush of strength and power pulse through her body as her muscles began to expand across her frame. Her taught runner legs expanded outward, filling with muscle and pressing hard against her skin, showcasing incredible definition and separation as they grew larger than any woman she had ever seen. The branch groaned with her increase in weight and as she pointed her legs outward to flex her massive thighs into the four distinct quad muscles and her calves into football sized diamond shaped curvy mounds of muscle. Ignoring the stressed tree, Sybil brought her arms up to her sides and flexed her back wide as muscle piled across her lats, up her expanding traps and across her rippling shoulders. Pulling in her stomach her abs glistened and roared into a nasty 10 pack with scary definition. She giggled as she felt her nearly nonexistent breasts inflate and push outward with her expanding pectorals. Per her wishes the running shorts expanded just enough so as not to rip off, but barely contained her bulbous, muscle filled glutes of steel. Her top expanded as well, even as more and more muscle cleavage was pushed forward.

Sybil dropped a few inches as the branch cracked and she smiled as she noticed two football players look around for the source of the sound. Glancing over at her right arm, Sybil tensed the muscle and the results from the initial flex were shocking. Gone was the wiry muscle, in was a brutish, hard, muscle bulging arm able to curl well over a ton! The bicep bunched and consolidated into a shredded ball with a peak well over her expanded shoulder with enough mass to push her equally pumped up forearm back a bit. Sybil flexed and pumped her arm a few times, reveling in the incredible hardness and shape of her bicep.

“Not bad. But now it’s time to for the boys to feel helpless and scared.”

Sybil scooted forward and fell to ground with a hard thud on the dirt ground. It didn’t take long for one of the football players to spot her.

“There she is!”

Sybil smiled as the football players converged on her position. Smiling, she whispered. “Yeah, here I am! Come and get me!”

152.content:
"I want them all in a room, like a lecture room. I'll be on stage and they'll be strapped down in the chairs, so they can't escape until I let them."

Instantly they were all transported to a scared down lecture hall. She stood on stage while the boys were strapped down in harnesses and seatbelts. They shouted and strained to get out, but the restraints were too tough to break and tight to wriggle out. Sybil wore a fresh running top and shorts. She put her hands on her hips and instructed the ring about her plan.

A bright light illuminated a projection screen with a life-sized picture of Clem Cowell, the quarterback who seemed in charge, wearing only his shorts. His impressive physique drew whistles from the team. Next to his image his height, 6'2", and his weight, 210 lbs. were specified. A second life-sized screen sprang to life showing Sybil dressed identically to the way she appeared on stage along with her height and weight, 5'7", 120 lbs.

"Shut up, you," she shouted. They ignored her and whistled. "Fine then. Maybe this will get your attention." She pointed a laser at the numbers on the screen and as the beam hit the bottom of the numbers the 6'2" changed to 6'1", then 6', 5'11", until they reached 5'3". The weight declined correspondingly, 7 lbs. per inch at first, then 5 lbs. per inch, ending at 140 lbs. The picture on the screen changed too, so that his image now looked up to Sybil's with a concerned, questioning look. She clicked a button on the device and the word "Fitness" appeared with a slider below it. The vertical line on the slider was almost at the extreme right end, but Sybil pointed the laser at it and slowly moved it to the left. As she did Clem's image steadily lost muscle tone. His six-pack disappeared as his stomach became soft and pudgy. His upper arms drooped. His expression became more and more concerned.

"This is bullshit! Stupid pointless bullshit!" the real Clem shouted. "Let us go, or you're going to be in real trouble!"

Sybil said nothing. She clicked the button on the device again and returned to the original screen. Pointing at the height, she reduced it to 5'1" but froze the weight at 140. Clem's image became even shorter and fatter. Her image looked down at Clem with a highly satisfied expression.

"That looks good to me!" she declared, looking straight at Clem. She walked in front of him, pointed the device at him and clicked. In an instant his body matched the image. The harness tightened around his smaller body, while the seatbelt expanded around his fatter waist.

"Hey, what the fuck!" he shouted. The room was in an uproar.

"I can't believe what she did!"

"This has to be a dream."

"A nightmare."

"What are you, a witch?"

Sybil pointed the device at Chunky. "You're next." An image of Chunky appeared. 6'6", 310 lbs. With a few clicks the image showed 5'9" and 320 pounds. He was still muscular, but with layers of fat around his middle and his limbs. She clicked to fitness and moved the slider from 75% fit to 25% fit, then clicked to a new screen, body parts. She traced a line around his groin. With a hand tool she stroked it, and quickly produced an impressive erection. There was an uneasy silence in the room, and the boys shifted in their seats, worried what would come next. She reshaped the line to match the erection. The figure 9" appeared on the screen. With the laser she reduced it to 7", then 5", then paused. The boys were murmuring. It went to 3", then 2".

"Don't! Not that!" Chunky begged.

Sybil walked in front of him. "Why? Is 2" too big?"

Sally held a football in her hand and palmed it against her hip.  “Clem!  Isn't this incredible?!  I don't know how it all just happened, but we girls are so much bigger now than you guys!  It’s gotta feel weird to you, but we love it!  I guess you guys are gonna be the ones cheering for us now!”

Clem looked up at Sally and snorted.  “I don't THINK so!  There's a lot more to playing football than muscle you know.  There's experience, strategy and skills. We've been playing for years, so don't think you're going to waltz in and take over,” he said with as much bravado as he could manage.

“Do you think we can’t learn the plays?” Sally countered.  “We've been watching as long as you've been playing.”

Clem laughed.  “You think that's the same?  I bet you girls can’t even throw a football properly!”

“It can't be hard, now that our hands are bigger.”  She tossed the ball underhanded at Clem, who caught it in his gut, groaning slightly at the strength of her throw.  “Let’s see.  Show me how you do it.  She walked back 10 yards.”

Clem frowned.  The ball felt strange in his hands -- too large and heavy.  He tried to fit his fingers where they belonged across the laces, but the curve of the ball felt wrong.  His pass to Sally was wobbly, short and offline.  

Sally looked surprised and picked it up.  She threw the ball back to Clem, straighter and harder than his pass. It slipped through his fingers and bounced several yards away.  He muttered to himself and chased after it, while Sally and May watched.  

“I bet you he can't reach you from there,” May said to Sally quietly.

“I think you're right. Let’s see,” Sally replied.  As soon as Clem touched the ball, she called out loudly, “Throw it back!”

She was fifteen yards away.  It was a medium length pass.  He threw it hard, wanting to drive it into her stomach.  The ball slipped from his fingers, arced lazily upwards with a pronounced wobble and fell six yards short.

“Where’d you get this cheap thing?” she sneered.  “A gum machine?”

Once Sophie took the ring away, all the sensations of well-being disappeared.  Esmerelda reasoned that whatever she had been feeling could not be from God if it was confined to an object.  It must therefore be a token of the devil.  The pleasure it seemed to bring would lead only to evil!  She was well rid of it, and now it was her duty to warn Sophie.  “It’s the work of the Devil!  Drop it!” she said insistently.

Esmerelda started to protest.  Her mother was a minister at the Baptist Church, and her father worked for the telephone company.  No!  She now thought had never known her father.  And her mother worked nights, cleaning offices.  At least she did until last year when she was sent to jail for prostitution after being arrested for soliciting the mayor’s son.  But she also remembered things the other way.  What was happening?

“You shouldn't be hanging around school, you know.  Not since you were kicked out, because you don't live in the district,” Sophie continued, arms crossed in front of her chest.

“That’s impossible,” she protested as she slowly came to remember it happening, her favorite teacher angrily pushing her out the school door while Sophie watched and applauded.  “My church.  They’ll help me!  They’ll find a place for me to stay so I can finish school here!” Esmerelda insisted.

Sophie looked down at the ring.  “You think so?  Really?  Are you the kind of girl they'd help?  They all believe the minister’s word over yours, about what the two of you were doing together late that night.  I know you said he forced you, but they think you encouraged him, looking for special favors.  They’ve forgiven him, but no one would trust you in their houses, with their husbands or their sons.  Maybe even their daughters. Like mother, like daughter, you know.” 

“I didn't ... I wouldn’t,” she protested, suddenly remembering the two of them in his office, her blouse off, her bra unhooked his zipper open and his -- ugh!.

“How sad that absolutely no one believes you,” Sophie replied.  “Maybe it would have been different if there had been some sign you’d resisted, if you hadn't folded your blouse so neatly, or put a cloth under your knee when you knelt down in front of him.  You are such a neat freak, and so good at cleaning clothes and ironing.  It’s a good thing you have me and my friends to give you work,” she said, winking at Beth and Connie. “Our grades have improved a lot, since you've been doing our homework and our papers, although since you don't go to our school anymore and you’re working so much, you’re getting worse.  We’ll start giving you more washing and ironing instead.”

Connie and Beth felt a little awkward, but Sophie just looked down at her.  “You’re a complete fool!  Do you have ANY idea the amount of power I have over you?  Over EVERYONE and EVERYTHING?  You thought you were warning me about the so-called ’evil’ in this ring, But there’s nothing ’evil’ about having power!  Already I've completely changed your life!  I’ve taken away your family, your reputation and your chance for education.  Just wait until you see what I'm going to do to you next!”
